apps.title: Magic Cross-Stitch: Pixel Art
apps.description:
Brighten up your weekdays and enjoy a wide collection of colorful pixel pictures! Start painting right now without paper and pencils! There’s no need to bother choosing colors - just paint by numbers and create your own masterpiece!

In Magic Cross-Stitch you can:

- Choose among an extensive variety of pictures for both adults and kids!
- Enjoy easy gameplay - just color by numbers!
- Use Augmented Reality Sharing to place your paintings on the walls around you! 
- Experiment with the color palette and improve your skills!
- Share finished pictures with friends on social media or save them to your phone!
- Get daily bonuses and gifts!

Magic Cross Stitch is great way to relax and get rid of everyday stress! Unveil your inner artist and paint effortlessly! Color by numbers and turn a plain sketch into a bright art piece! Paint everywhere just by using your phone or tablet!

Contact us at support_games@zimad.com with any issues, questions or comments. We would love to hear from you!

- Subscription:
Upon subscribing, you will immediately receive free access to the full collection of pixel art images! A subscription also allows you to create unlimited amount of your own user-created pixel art images and turns off ads in the game.
The price is $7.99 per week or equal to the same price tier that "Apple's App Store Price Matrix" determines in other currencies. 
In case of cancelling a subscription you lose all the benefits described above. 
Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.
Payment is charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews for the same price and duration period as the original package, unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal.

apps.title: GoArt - AI Art Image Generator
apps.developer: Chengdu Everimaging Science and Technology Co., Ltd
apps.description:
GoArt is an excellent AI image generator owned by Fotor, helping you create amazing artworks from text and photo easily. Allow you to use Photo Cartoonizer to turn your photos into cartoon avatars in one click. Take AI Art Generator From Text to convert your ideas into unique paintings, drawings in seconds. Even turn your photos into artworks in the style of Van Gogh, Monet, Picasso and other masters with AI art filters of Big Painter in a snap.

【PHOTO CARTOONIZER】
Just upload your selfie, GoArt's AI avatar maker can help you cartoon yourself into cartoon avatar easily. The anime filters are ready for you. Photo to cartoon is not only suitable for portraits, but for pets, kids, landscape, food, and more kinds of images. 

【AI ART FROM TEXT】
GoArt is a kind of AI art generator, converting your text to image in seconds. Various AI art styles to choose from, such as cyberpunk, anime, surrealism, oil painting, conceptual art illustration, etc, helps you create the dream AI photos precisely. You only need to enter a text prompt in Fotor's AI image generator and generate different AI-artworks quickly. Try the AI picture generator now. 

【MULTIPLE ARTISTIC STYLE FILTERS】
A variety of artistic filters of different styles and genres, such as impressionism, Van Gogh, ukiyo-e, sketch, anime filter etc., help you realize your distinctive creative pursuits, so that ordinary photos can become real art.

【MINT NFT】
Take your AI-generated artwork and mint it into NFT using GoArt. With just a few taps, you can turn your photos into unique NFT encrypted art and trade them in the NFT market.

【AI CUTOUT, ONE-CLICK TO CHANGE BACKGROUND】
Fully automatic magic tool, easily eliminates background, key out the required picture elements, generate transparent background image, and at the same time, you can replace the background with one click, with super solid color background material available for replacement, and also support selecting pictures from your album as background.

【EASY TO USE, FREE TO ADJUST】
One-click to turn your photos into artistic works, and support to adjust the strength freely.

【HIGH DEFINITION, PRINT SUPPORT】
It supports the export of HD pictures with 8 megapixels. Allow you to print your artworks on T-shirts, wallpaper, photo portfolios, etc.

The GoArt subscription fee is charged monthly or yearly. The fees for the GoArt plan are paid following purchase confirmation. The subscription will automatically renew on expiry unless the automatic renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the expiry of the current subscription period. Once the subscription is confirmed, your iTunes account will be charged according to the plan you chose. After purchase, you may go to the iTunes Settings to manage your subscription and turn the automatic renewal off. A canceled subscription becomes effective after one month.

Terms of Service:
https://mobile.fotor.com/mobile/goArt/services_en

Privacy Policy:

apps.title: AI Art Generator: PetArt
apps.description:
PetArt is the ultimate creative tool for pet lovers.
Turn your furry friends into magical, animated, and AI-generated content — from stunning photos to fun and personalized videos. Whether you have a dog, cat, or any other companion animal, PetArt transforms ordinary images into extraordinary art using the power of artificial intelligence.

With just a few taps, you can create personalized video experiences that match your pet’s personality, mood, or even fantasy scenarios. Ever wondered what your cat would look like dancing on a stage? Or your dog riding a roller coaster? PetArt makes it happen.

How It Works

PetArt uses cutting-edge AI models trained on thousands of pet images to analyze facial expressions, poses, and fur patterns. You start by uploading a photo of your pet, choose a video or image style, and within seconds, PetArt generates a custom creation just for you.

Whether it’s a portrait-style image, a playful animation, or a themed video, every output is unique — tailored to your pet’s look and vibe.

Why Pet Lovers Use PetArt
	•	Generate stunning AI-powered videos featuring your pet
	•	Create unique, artistic pet portraits and avatars
	•	Explore hundreds of templates and animated styles
	•	Celebrate your pet’s uniqueness with shareable, fun content
	•	Use for birthdays, pet profiles, social media, or just for fun
	•	No design skills required – just upload and go!

Works Perfectly With:
	•	Dogs, cats, and other common pets
	•	Photos from your gallery
	•	Live camera uploads
	•	Online or saved pet images

Use PetArt Anytime, Anywhere

Whether you’re at home, walking your dog, visiting a friend’s cat, or browsing social media — PetArt turns every moment into creative magic. Perfect for pet parents, animal lovers, and anyone who enjoys sharing personalized content.

Privacy & Terms

We care deeply about your privacy. All pet images are processed securely and temporarily for content generation purposes only.

Privacy Policy: https://www.dogidentifier.ai/legal/petart/privacy
Terms of Use: https://www.dogidentifier.ai/legal/petart/terms

apps.title: Art Puzzle - Jigsaw Games
apps.description:
Meet Art Puzzle, a brand new stress-relieving game by Easybrain. It's a unique place where coloring books meet jigsaw puzzles! Relax and engage your mind with breathtaking stories coming to life.

In Art Puzzle, you solve puzzles by fitting together pieces of a drawing and watching them build into a colorful animated painting. It's a completely new gaming experience of a classic coloring game.

Every puzzle has been specially created for Art Puzzle. Each puzzle is a unique multilayered piece of art. Many different artists have created fascinating paintings in which you can immerse yourself. Enjoy an incredible world of amazing stories. All pictures are hand-drawn with original styles and techniques. Explore hundreds of amazing pictures and brighten your mood! 

Enjoy Art Puzzle:

* Enjoy a fun twist on jigsaw puzzles and coloring books.
* Every picture comes to life as the puzzle animates when completed.
* Each game level is a little more challenging but very fun and relaxing.
* Tons of fascinating hand-drawn pictures from different artists, each with their own original style and technique.
* Stuck on a puzzle? Watch helpful hints that easily guide you to finish.

Create fun beautiful artwork as you challenge your mind and relax at the same time. Now, let’s get started with your first art puzzle!

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Performance and stability improvements.

We hope you enjoy playing Art Puzzle. We read all your reviews carefully to make the game even better for you. Please leave us some feedback to let us know why you love this game and what you'd like us to improve in it. Have fun with Art Puzzle!

apps.title: ARTLAS - Discover & Enjoy Art
apps.description:
Discover a world where creativity takes center stage and art comes to life. Explore stunning artworks, find exciting art events/exhibitions, and connect with the global art community! 

Take advantage of our AI art feature, which will guide you through museum tours, and our app's social character to share your artistic creations - Get daily inspiration to fuel your creativity!

From creating to discovering, this app connects you to a vibrant community and endless inspiration. Find unique artistic styles, get inspired by amazing stories, and join a community that loves art as much as you do.

AI Art Guides - Explore Museum Tours

Revolutionize your museum visits with the power of AI. Use the app’s AI art guide to explore curated tours like never before. Navigate through exhibits, learn about the history of each piece, and uncover intriguing details effortlessly. 

This feature enhances your museum experience, turning each visit into an unforgettable journey guided by the wisdom of an AI artist.

Find the Best Art Spots

Wondering where to experience exceptional art? This feature helps you discover top galleries, exhibitions, and cultural landmarks near you. Get personalized recommendations and find hidden gems that align with your interests. 

Whether traveling or exploring locally, you’ll always know where to go for your next artistic adventure.

Snap Art for Fun Facts

Make learning about art interactive and fun with this feature. Take a photo of any artwork and instantly uncover fun facts about its history, techniques, or creator. This innovative tool is ideal for anyone eager to explore the deeper stories behind every brushstroke and sculpture.

Showcase Your Artwork

Showcase your creativity with high-resolution uploads, customizable templates, and detailed descriptions to build a stunning portfolio. Share your art and connect with a global community, gaining visibility and recognition.

Discover Events & Exhibitions

Discover exhibitions, workshops, and events curated to your interests. Gain inspiration, learn new skills, and connect with others in the art community effortlessly.

Easily Master Art Knowledge

Art should be accessible and enjoyable for all. This app provides resources to explore techniques, understand diverse styles, and discover the stories behind iconic creators. Dive into captivating art stories and engaging content that make learning as inspiring as creating.

Connect with Artists & Art Enthusiasts

Discover opportunities to collaborate, gain mentorship, and share feedback with fellow artists. Build meaningful connections and grow within a supportive art community.

Engage with the Art Social Network

Be part of a dynamic art social network filled with creativity. Share your artwork, celebrate milestones, and connect with artists and collectors. Join discussions, exchange feedback, and immerse yourself in a community that values artistic expression.

Your Personal Art Studio

Your profile is your digital gallery, presenting your biography, creative projects, and artistic identity. Display your portfolio, connect with an audience, and grow your presence. With features that capture your unique journey, your profile becomes your own art studio.

Display and Share Your Vision

From workshops to exhibitions, this app is the perfect platform to showcase artwork in style. Share your process, techniques, and inspirations while connecting with others who appreciate your creative journey. Every piece finds its place to shine in this supportive environment.

Download our app now and explore breathtaking art, discover inspiring exhibitions, and engage with a vibrant art community. From learning with an AI art guide to connecting with other artists and sharing your artwork - We have everything you need to thrive in the art world!"

apps.title: DaVinci - Image Generator AI
apps.description:
Transform your words and images into stunning AI generated art! All you need to do is enter a prompt, pick an art style - and watch DaVinci AI bring your idea to life in seconds!

DaVinci is a state-of-the-art AI Photo Generator app. Using the latest artificial intelligence technology, it can create unique artworks, photos and images based solely on your descriptions.

Here are some cool things you can ask DaVinci AI to paint for you:
• Digital artworks
• Tattoo designs
• Signature Generator 
• Logo designs
• Hyper-realistic AI-generated photos
• AI-generated avatars of you
... and much more!

Key Features 
► AI Art Generator
Our AI art generator, trained with millions of images from the web, allows you to craft unique and captivating art drawings in seconds. Simply type in your text or upload a photo to start generating AI-generated art.
► Pick from a variety of art styles
DaVinci AI Photo Generator offers a variety of art styles to choose from. Experiment with different styles, from cartoon-like pencil sketches to mind-blowing photorealism, and discover the one that best transforms your vision into stunning AI art.
 ► Create unique artwork for your home or room.
Looking for the perfect artwork for your room or home? Describe your idea to AI Art Generator, and it will craft a one-of-a-kind artwork tailored just for you. If you love the result, you can download it in high resolution and have it printed to proudly display in your home.
► AI Tattoo Generator
With DaVinci AI, you can generate unique tattoo designs within seconds. Simply type in your idea, and let our powerful AI art generator work its magic. The AI tattoo generator feature produces amazing and one-of-a-kind tattoo designs. Our tattoo maker can bring your ideas to life and inspire you to create distinctive tattoo designs.
► Signature Generator 
Looking for the perfect signature creator? DaVinci AI allows you to create, generate, and personalize your signature effortlessly. Whether for business documents, emails, or personal branding, our signature maker lets you craft a stylish and professional signature in seconds.
► Logo Generator – AI-Powered Logo Design
Need a logo generator to bring your brand identity to life? DaVinci AI’s logo maker transforms your ideas into stunning logos with just a few clicks. Describe your vision, select a design style, and let AI handle the rest. Whether you're launching a startup or refreshing an existing brand, our intelligent tool ensures you get a high-quality, professional logo in seconds!
► AI Photo Generator
The AI Photo Generator feature can produce hyper-realistic, high-resolution photos and images from your prompts. You'll be amazed at how lifelike and realistic the AI-generated photos appear.
► AI Avatar Generator
Create extraordinary avatar versions of yourself with the latest artificial intelligence technology. Simply upload your photos, select your desired styles, and watch DaVinci work its magic. Transform into a soccer player, an astronaut, or explore dozens of other styles. With AI Avatar Generator feature the choice is entirely yours.
► Share your Creations & Go Viral
If you've created something you love using DaVinci’s powerful AI-art generator, you can directly share your masterpieces from the app to other platforms.
Creating AI-generated art has become effortless and readily accessible from mobile devices.
Similar to popular tools like Dall-e, Stable Diffusion and AI Mirror, our AI Art Generator is backed by the latest artificial intelligence to transform your written prompts into art. No brushes, pencils, or art supplies are needed to craft stunning art now; only your imagination. Sit back and let DaVinci AI become the artist behind your vision!
We value your feedback! If you have suggestions or feedback to make DaVinci AI better, we'd love to hear from you. Don't hesitate to contact us at support@davinci.ai

Privacy Policy: https://davinci.ai/app-privacy
Terms of Use: https://davinci.ai/terms

apps.title: Pixquare - Pixel Art Studio
apps.description:
Pixquare is the #1 pixel art editor, recommended by top pixel artists, game developers, and creators worldwide! Whether you're a beginner or a pro, its simple interface and rich toolset make pixel art creation easy and fun!

Download now to create game assets, animate, or simply doodle pixel art! With feedback from thousands of artists, Pixquare is designed for your best pixel art experience ever!

• HIGHLIGHTS:
  - Support both iPads & iPhones
  - Highly customizable and intuitive UI with left-hand mode available 
  - RGB and Indexed mode
  - Tileset/Tilemap system
  - Timelapse recording
  - Apple Pencil support: gestures, sensitivity, touch rejection 
  - Manual & auto-save modes
  - Shortcut options: keyboard, gesture pad, joystick
  - Custom themes 

• VERSATILE TOOLS:
  - Brush: spray, pixel perfect, pressure sensitivity, contour, dithering, custom brush, jumble, blur
  - Eraser: pixel perfect, pressure sensitivity, dithering
  - Move: transformation and snapping supported
  - Line: straight & curve mode, perfect angle
  - Shape: ellipse & rectangle mode, filled, perfect ratio
  - Selection: 5 types & 5 modes
  - Color: solid/gradient fill, contiguous/non-contiguous, and more
  - Color picker: 4 modes (HSV, HSL, Wheel, RGB), history, drag-to-fill
  - All tools offer shading
  - Additional tools:
    + Color replace
    + Color adjustment
    + Outline
    + Text with font import capability
    +  Custom object

• LAYER/TIMELINE PANEL:
  - Optimized for animation & organized layers
  - Multi-selection, layer grouping, frame tagging, and bulk operations
  - Visibility and editing-lock toggle
  - Supports reference layers
  - Frame duration and cel opacity
  - Linked cells, onion skin, and clipping mask

• ADDITIONAL FEATURES:
  - Symmetry tool with unlimited axes
  - Reference images
  - Color palette: save/load from Lospec, import/export, color gradient generator
  - Blending modes, alpha lock
  - Preview with a separate animation loop
  - Canvas rotation, Finder-like file system
  - Guideline

• FILE IMPORT/EXPORT:
  - Aseprite file compatibility (importing & exporting)
  - GIF importing with all frames
  - PNG, GIF, MOV, Sprite sheet export options (layers, frames, size, and animation)
  - Import Photos and files as reference layers and images

-------------------------------

WHY ARTISTS LOVE PIXQUARE?

"Genuinely the best pixel art app for the iPad that I would recommend anyone to get!" - Jon Davies, Pixel Artist on Super House of Dead Ninjas, Binding of Isaac.

"Pixquare has more than meets the eye. A seemingly simple interface that has the intuitive control you look for. The gesture pad is comparable to a desktop keypad." - Michael, Pixel Artist, Author of Pixel Logic book

"I've been sharing it with basically everyone I know with an iPad because I think it's one of the best software out there for creating pixels on the iPad." - CupOhJoe, Game Developer

"This is one fine app to pixel on the iPad! You can tell there's a lot of love for the craft poured in here" - Ota Jaider, Pixel Artist

-------------------------------

• SCREENSHOT ARTWORK AUTHORS：
- FICO (@FicoPx)
- Tofu (@tofupixel.bsky.social)
- Mossy (@MossyPixe)
- chili (@ryviolie)
- Lesma (@pixe_lesma)
- ue_voxel (@UeVoxel)
- TransientCode (@TransientCode)
- 08games (@the08games)
- Rinspirit_art(@rinspiritart.bsky.social)
- natalie (@cafeaunat)

-------------------------------

SUPPORT:
User guide: https://docs.pixquare.art
Email: info@pixquare.art
Twitter: https://twitter.com/pixquare_app
Website: https://www.pixquare.art/

NO SUBSCRIPTION. BUY ONCE AND ENJOY FREE UPDATES FOREVER!

Coloring books and mandalas are proved to help adults release the stress and feel better: test it now! It is a great way to relax your mind and have fun! Enjoy this color therapy now!

Girls and boys can also draw and paint several coloring pages in this app. It is a fun book for all ages: adults and kids!

Features:
- Color beautiful florals, animals, Fantasy, mandalas, Birds, people, Food, and more
- Create your own color combinations in this awesome coloring game
- Draw mandalas
- Color and recolor as many time as you want
- Designed for adults but kids and little girls can also enjoy the coloring experience.
- Easy controls! Simply tap to paint and pinch to zoom on the coloring pages
- Experiment with beautiful palettes and mandalas
- Design unique work with new filters and effects
- Share your pages and creations with family and friends
- Post your art and get likes from your followers on Instagram or Twitter
- Works offline! No wifi needed to relax on the best coloring book.

• New images and pictures every week
• Coloring books anywhere
Coloring Book for Adults is a free app and does not require any internet connection. Have fun with it in the garden, while kids play video games, or during a long flight. Relax and be creative. You can play it online or offline!

• Connect with the world in a new, meaningful, and beautiful way
Share your creations in Instagram, Snapchat, Messenger, Facebook and more. Have the most beautiful coloring pages! The colors you choose say a lot about your true feelings. 

Coloring Book For Adults Premium
- You can subscribe to daily content and unlimited access to all books and color palettes included in the app

- You'll be able to access all available designs and color palettes and receive daily updates for the duration of your subscription

- The subscriptions are $9.99 USD weekly, $17.99 USD monthly and $49.99 USD annually (or equivalent price tier in other territories specified by "Apple's App Store Matrix"). Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.

- You may manage your subscription and auto-renewal by going to your iTunes Account Settings after purchase. Cancelling a subscription must be done 24 hours before the end of the free-trial or subscription period to avoid being charged.

- Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period. Any unused portion of a free-trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a Premium subscription.

• Compatibility
We're continuously working so that all iOS phones and tablets run Coloring Book for Adults the best way possible.

* Prices are equal to the value that "Apple's App Store Pricing Matrix" determines as the equivalent of the subscription price in $ USD

Links to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy can be found below
Privacy Policy: http://www.advancedstudios.com/privacy.html
Terms of Use: http://www.advancedstudios.com/terms_of_service.html

apps.title: Art of War: Legions
apps.description:
A funny game with huge amount of spectacular battles. You will be the commander who leads legions of tiny armies. Accept the challenges of various levels and don’t forget to get extra rewards from bounty tasks! It’s your army, you in charge.

*【Exciting Battles】The battle is more like a real dance of war. Hope you can become a glorious commander and have a lot of fun.

*【Extra Bounty Tasks】 Those cool bounty tasks will be unlocked once you reach level 14. You can get precious gems by finishing those tasks. But be aware that some of them are really tricky.

*【Regular Updates】 We are a young team, but we always strive to improve your game experience and make the game incredible time-killer.We are really happy to receive any feedback from you. If you have problem or questions about the game you can find answer in our FAQ. You can find our FAQ in the help section of the in-game settings or by this link: http://www.armyneedyou.com/support/faq

VIP membership subscription:
- You can subscribe for VIP membership, It gives you 150 gems + 5000 coins every day and unlocks battle time acceleration option.
- The VIP membership has three duration options:  Per Week, Per Month and Per Year. 
1）Weekly Subscription costs $6.99 and starts after 3 days of the free trial.
2）Monthly Subscription costs $9.99 and starts after 3 days of the free trial.
3）Yearly Subscription costs $99.99 and starts after 3 days of the free trial.
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
- You will be able to use premium features for the duration of the subscription.
- Subscription automatically renews at the same price unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
- Subscriptions can be managed by the user and after purchase, auto-renewal may be turned off in the user's iTunes Account Settings. 
- No cancellation of the current subscription period is allowed.
- You may cancel a subscription during its free trial period via the subscription setting through your iTunes account. This must be done 24 hours before the end of the trial period to avoid being charged. Please visit https://support.apple.com/HT202039 for more information.

Our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use: https://www.89trillion.com/privacy.html; https://www.89trillion.com/service.html

We are really happy to receive any feedback from you. If you have problem or questions about the game you can find answer in our FAQ. You can find our FAQ in the help section of the in-game settings or by this link: http://www.armyneedyou.com/support/faq

 Follow us: 
1) Discord -  https://discord.com/invite/artofwar  
2) Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/GameAoW/
3) Twitter - https://twitter.com/GameAoW
4) Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/artofwar_legions/

Wish you a good time, Commander!

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Bug Fixes
1. [Next] button didn’t work on friend profiles.
2. Fixed red dot issues for frames
3. Units got stuck in the Windra battles.
4. Removed unavailable troops from the Card summon wishlist.
Others
Improved interactions for Home, Territory, Exp, Clan, and Clan Chat.

apps.title: starryai - Image Art Generator
apps.description:
starryai is a state-of-the-art AI art generator that lets you create stunning, high-quality visuals in just a few taps. 

1. Enter a prompt for the AI to work with (it can be anything!)

2. Select a preferred style

That's it! Within minutes your unique AI-generated artwork will be ready for you to enjoy.

starryai is completely free to use, and you can generate up to 5 artworks for free every day without any watermarks. Plus, you'll have full ownership of your creations with starryai, so you can use them for your next art project, print them out, or share them on social media without any restrictions.

One of the standout features of starryai is its powerful AI Art Generator, which uses the latest methods to ensure that your creations are of the highest quality. The models are regularly updated to ensure they're always improving, so you can be confident that your art will look its best. And if you're not completely satisfied with the result, you can easily edit the artwork with the retouch feature. Simply draw over what you don't want and write a prompt to change it.

starryai is the perfect tool for anyone who wants to explore their creativity and create stunning art pieces. Whether you're an experienced artist or a beginner, you'll find starryai's user-friendly interface and intuitive controls easy to use and highly effective. 

With starryai customizability, you can choose from a variety of styles, aspect ratios, and initial images to create truly unique artworks. Whether you prefer abstract designs or realistic landscapes, starryai's art generator has something for everyone.

starryai is a powerful and versatile AI Art Generator that is sure to inspire your creative spirit. With its free-to-use model, full ownership of your creations, and customizability, it's a great choice for anyone looking to explore the limitless possibilities of AI-generated art. Try it out today and see what amazing art pieces you can create!

Contact: https://twitter.com/get_starryai

Privacy Policy: https://www.starryai.com/privacy

Terms & Conditions: https://www.starryai.com/terms

starryai offers a paid Pro subscription.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Bug fixes & performance improvements!
Fewer bugs, faster load times, and a smoother ride. It's like a tune-up for your favorite app!
We sent the bugs packing and gave performance a boost. Everything's zippier now — go take it for a spin!

apps.title: Paint by Number Oil: Hey Color
apps.description:
Plunge into the fascinating world of coloring with Hey Color app — a perfect tool to relieve stress & release your inner artist.
 
Want to take your mind off & relax after a busy day? Let stunning artworks help you beat anxiety, fall asleep quickly or simply pass the time!
 
Just follow the numbers to bring them to life and get relaxed.
 
FEATURES
– 10 000 + COLORING PAGES TO PAINT. Animals, Flowers, Nature, People, Places, Mandalas, Birds, Patterns, Fantasy, Fashion, Lifestyle, Yummy, Messages, Marine, Holidays, For Kids, Transport, Home and Garden, and more.
– SPECIAL IMAGES. Color stunning rare images with special effects. 
– NEW ACHIEVEMENTS. Complete daily missions and get more rewards.
– DAILY UPDATES. 8 new artworks are added every day for your joy.
– MYSTERY MAGIC IMAGES. Play secret images - unveil the pictures as you color them and enjoy vivid paintings.
– EXCLUSIVE BONUS PACKS. We collaborate with a team of artists, who design exclusive pictures especially for you.
– ONE-HAND COLORING. Unlike other similar apps, colors change automatically when you move the palette, so you don’t need to make 2 taps.
– USEFUL HINTS. Enhanced zoom-in helps you find tiny hard-to-spot cells.
– QUICK SHARING. Share your finished artworks on all social networks with friends.
– BONUSES. Play games on our Facebook page and get bonuses!
– NEW WIDGETS. Add our amazing daily pic widget.

HOW TO PLAY
* Choose the picture you like.
* Color pieces by their numbers.
* Done!
* Share with friends on Facebook or Instagram.
 
Relieve stress with color-by-number art book!
 
Privacy Policy: http://zephyrmobile.com/privacy/
Terms of Use: http://zephyrmobile.com/terms/

apps.title: Artist.ai - AI Art Generator
apps.description:
Unleash your creativity by creating art with artificial intelligence! Artist AI is the best app to have fun while easily creating unique, beautiful art! Just type in a text prompt, choose an awesome style, and in just a few seconds you’ll have a beautiful, unique artwork that the world has never seen before. 


CREATE UNIQUE ARTWORK

Your imagination is the limit. Use creative prompts such as “lion wearing a suit”, or “New York as a jungle” and you’ll be in awe at the beautiful artwork that Artist AI will generate. 

REALISTIC AND ARTISTIC AVATARS

Discover limitless self-expression with our AI Portrait and Avatar creation features. Select from a wide selection of styles for your headshots, or share artistic avatars from your very own 100-avatar gallery! 

You can now picture yourself in the style of 90's Yearbook, or impress the world with a stunning LinkedIn profile photo, even picture yourself touring all over the world using our Travel packs! If that is not enough, you can enjoy hundreds of pictures of yourself in over 27 unique avatar styles that you can use for Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and more!

BEAUTIFUL ART STYLES

Select from different art styles powered by AI: 

•    Beautiful Portrait
•    Anime
•    Van Gogh
•    Cyberpunk
•    Landscape Painting
•    3D
•    Drawing 
•    Comic
•    Concept Art
•    and a lot more!

With Artist AI, you can easily create stunning images using just your imagination and the power of AI. Whether you're an experienced artist or just looking to explore your creative potential, this app has everything you need to create unbelievable art. So what are you waiting for? Start creating amazing works of art today with a Artist.ai. Download now!


Follow us on Instagram: @artistaiapp
Terms: https://www.livintis.com/artistai-terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.livintis.com/artistai-privacy-policy

Download Artist.ai Today!

apps.title: Prisma: Photo Editor, Filters
apps.description:
You don’t need to be an experienced photo editor to turn photos into captivating digital art. Why? Because there’s Prisma for it! With the Prisma photo editor, it’s easy to unleash the artist within and go from average photo to mesmerizing edit in seconds!

Recognized as the App of the Year in 2016 Prisma has a constantly growing community of over 120 million users all over the world. Prisma provides a lot of features both for general and selfie photo editing. Download Prisma and let AI technology convert your photos into an artistic piece!

FEATURES

EXTENSIVE LIBRARY OF STYLES

More than 500 various styles are waiting for you to be tried out in Prisma’s library. New styles are going live on a daily basis for you to spruce up your creativity. You can also try Portrait styles that are specially designed for making captivating selfies.

TOP-NOTCH FUNCTIONALITY

•Among the best selection of Prisma’s tools to customize your photo, it’s worth mentioning the Portrait Segmentation feature. The essential tool for selfies is set to not only add the style to the whole image but also be applied either to the person or the background separately.

•Another way to enhance your photos without putting too much effort into the editing process is using vivid frames that will complement absolutely any of your photos.

•And the icing on the cake — Prisma’s feature for background editing. With this tool, you can replace the background of any selfie you want! You can select the background from the colorful templates, or choose any other from your phone’s gallery.

ALL THE BENEFITS IN ONE PLAN

A Prisma Premium subscription gives access to any style without an exception and allows you to save photos in HD quality!

Before purchasing a subscription, you can try Prisma for 3 days for FREE. You can then choose from several subscription plans that have the same set of features. The only difference is the time interval for each plan.

———————————————
Prisma Premium Subscription:

Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. The account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Terms of Use http://prisma-ai.com/terms
Privacy Policy http://prisma-ai.com/privacy

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

Redbubble begins with over 700,000 independent artists. A global community making everyday products weirdly meaningful. A shirt with an evil cat. A phone case with a galloping donut. A sticker of a star-surfing astronaut. Whatever your thing, Redbubble has uncommon designs that smack you right in the heart.

- Explore nearly 10 million original designs on 60+ products
- Check out personalized picks of super fun stuff
- Save your faves for later
- Support independent artists with every single purchase
- Find inspiration, an original gift, or just run wild
- Stickers, T-Shirts, Device Cases, Home Decor, Posters + more

- Save your faves for later
- Support independent artists with every single purchase

- Stickers, T-Shirts, Device Cases, Home Decor, Posters + more

Sound good? Why not take a look around. We think you'll like what you find.

apps.title: Art Master: Jigsaw Puzzle
apps.description:
Relaxing coloring art puzzle game that both kids and adults will love!

Art Master: Jigsaw Puzzle is a new interesting wit puzzle and coloring game where you need to restore pictures from parts.

Start assembling the picture – initially there will be no objects on it. Items to place on will be displayed at the bottom. Look closely at the picture and find the spot where to place the item. As soon as all the items are placed in their places, the picture will be completed! Assemble variety of pictures – ranch, city park, airport, and many more!

Why you'll love Art Master: Jigsaw Puzzle:
- Unique gameplay
- Bright & colorful pictures
- Great combination of two genres: puzzle and coloring!
- Free hints

So what are you waiting for? Download Art Master: Jigsaw Puzzle and start restore pictures from parts!

apps.title: TokyoArtBeat
apps.description:
Tokyo Art Beat is your essential companion for exploring art and design exhibitions across Japan. Our newly unified design and enhanced features make navigating the art world simpler than ever.

Free Features

•	Search and browse exhibitions
•	Filter events with precise search criteria
•	Find nearby art spaces with interactive maps
•	Access the latest news and articles

Premium Features (First Month Free)

•	Save on museum visits with "MuPon" discounts
•	Track exhibitions with bookmarks and visit logs
•	Bookmark your favorite articles
•	Share your thoughts through exhibition ratings and comments
•	Organize events in custom lists
•	Plan better with email alerts and sortable map pins

Seamless Integration with the Web Version

•	One account for both web and mobile
•	Access all features across platforms

How to Use This App

•	Browse exhibitions and articles for free
•	Unlock all features with a premium plan (first month free)

Experience Japan's vibrant art scene with Tokyo Art Beat—your personal guide to the art world.

apps.title: Cross Stitch Coloring Art
apps.description:
Cross stitch is the oldest form of embroidery and has traveled across countries and over many centuries to become a versatile stitch used today. It is more than just an embroidery stitch, it is a craft that has been integrated into all sorts of needle and thread art forms.

Have you ever looked at x-stitch patterns and didn’t even know where to start? Well, you’re in the right place, this amazing embroidery game is at hand!

If you are completely new to embroidery, do not worry, it’s really easy - just choose the suitable color and click to the right place. Get ready for a happier satisfying stitching experience.

Enjoy the coloring book with your creative ideas and feel like an artist with a complete variety of anti-stress pictures. Cross Stitch Coloring Art is an amusing sandbox coloring that allows the brain to relax and focus, often recommended for achieving mindfulness. Don’t forget to have fun and relax! Embroidery is proven to be hugely beneficial for your mental and physical health.

You’ll not only end up with a nicer finished masterpiece, but you’ll enjoy this addictive creative process even more!

Privacy Policy:
https://www.playcus.com/privacy-policy

Terms of Service:
https://www.playcus.com/terms-of-service

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Improved performance and faster image loading.
Fixed minor bugs for a more stable experience.
Coloring is now even smoother and more convenient.

apps.title: UNICORN 3D: Color by Number
apps.description:
Have you ever wondered turning 2D coloring book into 3D one? Sounds exciting? Well, welcome to the Unicorn 3D coloring by numbers - perfectly designed stress relieving coloring app as well as a fun way for all to spend free time together!

In this off the chart app you can fully unleash your creativity by coloring favorite characters designed out of numerous voxels.

Make a selection from a wide range of 3D coloring pages & simply follow the numbers inside the voxels to fill them with colors. Cool animated video will be generated!

App features:
• AR coloring mode!
• User-friendly interface
• Super duper collection of 3D animated voxel figures!
• Stress Relieving
• Professionally designed 

So, how about getting yourself best coloring experience ever? There is no manner of doubt to proceed by installing the app :)

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING AND TERMS

Subscription options:
Weekly Gold Membership offers $9.99 weekly subscription after 3-day free trial for unlocking all content, features and removing ads.
Monthly Gold Membership offers $19.99 monthly subscription for unlocking all content, features and removing ads.
Weekly Membership offers $9.99 weekly subscription for unlocking all content, features and removing ads.

End of trial and subscription renewal:

This price is for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.

Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal.

Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase.
Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

apps.title: Pixelable - Pixel Art Editor
apps.description:
Here is a pleasant pixel art editor!

This is an app which pursue the stress-free and intuitively drawing of pixel art.
The app has genuine functions, like layer editing, color making, and various tools. Also, you can operate intuitively. For example you can enlarge and reduce the canvas by pinch in or pinch out.


Main functions are below.

- Layer editing 
You can add and erase, and copy layers. Also, you can select display or non-display mode, change the order of layers, and make a layer transparent.

- Tools
The app has basic tools to draw pixel arts. (For example, pen, spuit, filling and transfer)

・Undo and redo
You can cancel drawing.

- Animated GIF export
Each layer is going to be one frame.

- Color making
You can make your favorite color easily.
You can save 150 colors in maximum by a work.

- Pinch in and pinch out
You can enlarge and reduce the canvas by pinch in and out. It enables you to draw more details.

- Saving multiple pictures
You can save several projects, so that you can edit other projects later.

- Setting canvas size
You can select the size of canvas from 5*5 to 256*256.

- Setting a exporting pixel size 
You can select exporting size. Pictures will be saved to camera roll as a png file.

- Reflection function
You can reflect the selected layer vertical and horizontal.


※There is another flunked app, ‘Dottable’.
※To prevent a crash, you need more than 150MB of free space to make a new project. Sorry for the inconvenience.

apps.title: Mesmerizely - AI Generated Art
apps.description:
Turn simple words into beautiful pieces of art.
Mesmerizely allows you to turn your ideas into reality.
You just need to enter any text, and our AI will create beautiful pictures ready to be shared on any social media or to be sent to your friends.

*UNLIMITED IDEAS*
Give our AI any idea you have, and the app will try to transform it into a beautiful piece of art.
A dog in the style of Van Gogh?
A cat walking on Mars?
A teddy bear riding a horse in the middle of times square?
Yes, all of these is possible with our AI.

*MULTIPLE STYLES*
You can pick any style you want for your picture.
If you want a more classical look, we offer styles like Van Gogh or Picasso.
For a more modern look, try our comic book or our illustration style.
The possibilities are endless!

*EASY SHARING TO GO VIRAL*
Once you’re happy with your picture, you can easily share it on any social media platform or send it to your friends.
Share your creation on Instagram Reels, Instagram Stories, Tiktok, Pinterest, Snapchat, Twitter.
You will always have something cool to share and to grow and wow your audience.

**RELIEVE STRESS EASILY**

apps.title: AI Art Generator - UniDream AI
apps.description:
"AI Painting, Infinite Possibilities, All in Unidream"

Unidream is a versatile AI painting tool app that allows you to quickly create your own dreamy art pieces by simply entering text or uploading an image. Whether you're a beginner or a professional artist, Unidream helps you effortlessly create and explore endless creativity.

App Features:

- Text to Image
Simply enter a description to generate scenes from your dreams. We also provide multiple description optimization aids: a Spell Generator offers hundreds of prompt options for your combination; AI Smart Expansion uses large language models to enrich your creativity; Random Inspiration Feature helps you discover more creative possibilities.

- Image to Image
Upload an image and transform it with one click into 3D, 90s anime, watercolor and cyberpunk, achieving instant anime conversion, line art to 3D, and even classic character cosplay experiences. Enhance details, intelligently enhance faces, and control poses to improve image precision and creative control.

- AI Inpaint
Point and change with one click—hairstyles, backgrounds, and more can be instantly altered by AI.

- AI Expand
Smartly expand any ratio to easily rescue failed shots; creativity is limitless.

- Line Art Coloring
Want to be a painter? Upload your sketch, and Unidream automatically refines and colors it, instantly bringing your ideas to life.

- AI Art Photography
Upload an original image, maintain the pose, and generate various studio-quality creative portraits, easily achieving professional photo effects.

- Image Quality Enhancement
Enhance the clarity of blurry real-life photos or low-resolution anime images with a single click.

Explore more features such as AI QR Code, AI Background Change, and One-Click Poster Making to discover more creative play.

App Advantages:

- Fast Image Output: High-performance machines and optimized algorithms ensure quick generation of high-quality images.
- Batch Generation: Supports batch processing to save time and increase efficiency.
- Free Trial: Collect a free painting card daily, try before you pay.
- Rich AI Tools: Offers a variety of advanced features to meet various creative needs.

Subscription Information:

- Subscribe to VIP to unlock monthly updated resources and all VIP features.
- Subscription Options: $4.99 per month, $24.99 per year.
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
- Auto-Renewal: Automatically renews 24 hours before the end of the current period; users can manage subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal in account settings.
- Free Trial: Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription.

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:

- Privacy Policy: https://www.thirteenleafclover.com/privacy_unidream.html
- Terms of Use: https://www.thirteenleafclover.com/agreement_unidream.html

Oh hello there! Welcome to Voilà AI Artist, a special little app that turns your photos into stunning pieces of art such as i3D Cartoon , Renaissance Painting, Hand Drawn Caricature by combining Human's creativity and Artificial Intelligence's capabilities.

Have limitless fun!
- Get yourself painted as 15th century, 18th century and 20th century paintingss
- Turn your selfie into 3D Cartoon out of animated movies
- Get your very own Royalty Cartoon drawing , or maybe a Baby Cartoon version of yourself
- Have a little LOL-tastic moment, getting your photo drawn as a hilarious caricature
And many more to come :)


About Voilà AI Artist
Voilà AI Artist is the first product created with love by WEmagine.ai , a team of 2 founders, creative and technology enthusiasts who love to create something wonderful by combining the best of Human and AI 's best capabilities. 


We care about your privacy
We take your privacy seriously and will make sure to update you with transparent and clear updated TOS and Privacy Policy. 

-- Our app does NOT collect nor store any face data including any biometrics data
-- All photos uploaded by users are through permissions and IMMEDIATELY destroyed in the cloud after processing
-- We are using Google Cloud and Amazon Web Services as our backend and servers are hosted in US

apps.title: AI Art Photo Generator: ArtLab
apps.description:
Create digital art using verbal prompts! Unleash the power of AI technology with ArtLab AI – a professional AI art generator. Generate unique images, portraits, avatars, art styles, and more. Breathe life into your creative ideas in a matter of seconds!

Design amazing works of art hassle-free with our user-friendly tool. Simply describe what you want to get and choose your preferred style (Realistic, Anime, Fantasy, Tattoo Design, or else). Then tap the button and enjoy your exclusive AI-generated art.

Here are the possibilities you can leverage with our AI art picture generator.

► TURN WORDS INTO UNIQUE DIGITAL ART
Want to see what would an alien disco party in a faraway galaxy look like? Or maybe you’d like to capture the Avengers having their morning coffee in the Central Perk coffeehouse? Bring your wildest ideas to life with your creative AI generator. Our tool was trained using millions of images available online to turn your descriptions into stunning digital art.

► GET AI-GENERATED PICTURES BASED ON YOUR IMAGES
If you already have an image, photo, or portrait your artwork should resemble, with ArtLab AI you can use it as your visual prompt. Just upload the file or select it from your media library to let the AI drawer deliver the picture that perfectly matches your vision.

► DISCOVER VARIOUS ART STYLES
Ready to experiment? Use different techniques and styles to get AI-generated photos and images of any kind. Whether you want to create a Pixar-style cartoon character, a photorealistic scenery, or a futuristic city – our AI-generated photo app got you covered. 

► GENERATE AI PHOTOS FOR AVATARS
Discover new versions of yourself with ArtLab AI. Use a unique AI portrait as the avatar for your social media profile to impress your followers. Use a simple description and let AI transform you into an anime character, MCU superhero, or The Simpsons-style fellow in a single click.

► CREATE INCREDIBLE TATTOO DESIGNS
Generate AI images with ArtLab AI to come up with outstanding tattoo designs. Implement your tattoo ideas with ease – no expensive art supplies are needed! Just type your prompt or upload a picture reflecting your vision for magical image transformation.

► SHARE YOUR CUSTOM ART AND GO VIRAL!
Thrill the global art community with your captivating visuals. Join influential AI artists using our powerful tool. ArtLab AI allows you to share your works directly from the application via messages or social media posts.
 
Ready for an amazing art exploration journey? Generating and sharing your creations has never been easier! Try our tool powered by AI. ArtLab AI is a perfect solution for artists, designers, photographers, marketing specialists, and anyone else striving to dive into the world of digital art.

You can enable a free trial to access the features included in the subscription.
PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION
• You can subscribe to get unlimited access to certain app features.
• Subscriptions are billed weekly or annually at the rate selected, depending on the subscription plan.

Privacy Policy: https://ai-art-gen.com/privacy-policy/
Terms of Service: https://ai-art-gen.com/terms-of-use/

apps.title: Paint by Number: Coloring Game
apps.description:
Feeling stressed? No need to!

Choose from a variety of super fun images, paint just by following the numbers and watch them come to life! Rediscover the joy of painting.

Key features:
- Easy painting anywhere: carry your coloring book in your pocket
- Themes for all tastes: florals, animals, mandalas and more!
- Share with your friends: show off your works of art!
- Never get bored: new images everyday!

Create lovely paintings with the new painting app, painting has never been this easy and fun!

Paint Premium subscription
- All prices are subject to change without notification.
- We occasionally run promotion prices as incentives or limited time opportunities for qualifying purchases made during the promotional time period. Due to the time sensitive and promotional nature of these events, we are unable to offer price protection or retroactive discounts or refunds for previous purchases in the event of a price reduction or promotional offering.
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
- You will be able to color all available images for the duration of the subscription
- Subscription automatically renews for the same price and duration period as the original "one week"/"one month"/"one year" package unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period at the cost of the chosen package (weekly, monthly or yearly package)
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's iTunes Account Settings after purchase
- No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period
- You may cancel a subscription during its free trial period via the subscription setting through your iTunes account. This must be done 24 hours before the end of the subscription period to avoid being charged
- Please visit http://support.apple.com/kb/ht4098 for more information
- You may turn off the auto-renewal of your subscription via your iTunes Account Settings. However, you are not able to cancel the current subscription during its active period
- Any unused portion of a free-trial period, will be forfeited when the user purchases a Paint Premium subscription

Links to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy can be found below

Privacy Policy:  https://www.fungames-forfree.com/games/paintbynumber/legal/privacy
Terms of Use: https://www.fungames-forfree.com/games/paintbynumber/legal/tos

*Prices are equal to the value that "Apple's App Store Pricing Matrix" determines as the equivalent of the subscription price in $ USD

apps.title: 4ART
apps.description:
Create a forgery-proof 4ARTpassport for your artworks. Manage your artwork and its provenance. By using the 4ARTapp, the provenance of your artwork is seamlessly updated. All artwork related processes are automatically documented for you.

Take a clear look at your art collection in lists or detailed views. Enjoy artworks in the virtual gallery or use VR glasses for a unique experience.

Share your artworks with interested parties and lovers, assuring that images and provenance-documents are secured. 

Shared artworks can also be viewed at any time in the virtual gallery.

Enjoy artworks selected by artists and art lovers, free of charge. You can view these published compilations of artworks also in the VR gallery.

Features:

Artwork registration and management:
You can register artworks and manage the related data

Compilation management:
You can create compilations of artwork and share them with other art lovers.

Authenticate registered artworks:
You can forgery-proof identify registered artworks.
 
Share artworks:
You have the option to share artworks with other 4ARTapp users

Transfers:
Possessor change, change of location and Transfer of ownership can be fully documented with the 4ARTapp

VR gallery:
With the VR Gallery you have the opportunity to view artworks on a virtual tour. 

Discovery Mode:
Your registered artworks are recognized and the related information is provided to you

Employee management:
You have the option of letting other people work on your behalf.

Services that are available to you, free of charge are, the sharing of artworks and compilations, the VR Gallery and the change of location and ownership.

Paid services include the registration and authentication of artworks, the documentation of a transfer of ownership, as well as the loan.

apps.title: April - Oil Painting by Number
apps.description:
Color by number app that is completely unique - color with swipes instead of taps. You are unlocking more paintings while leveling up, and we’re not hiding any tiny spots to color from you (no magnifying glass needed!). It is all you would want out of a paint by number app and more!

Besides making your painting realistic, April Coloring provides you with top-notch handcrafted free content and overall premium app quality, to help you become a more relaxed and creative person. To make sure that April Coloring brings you realistic experience and relaxation, we focused on user experience, simplicity and great community around the app!

WHY USE APRIL

● We know you appreciate coloring activities and probably you are using plenty of other coloring apps. What we wanted to excite you with is a completely unique approach towards the way coloring feels. Just download the app and check it out yourself!
● We want to make things easier for you. Just tap on the palette and you will find the right spot instantly. You may also tap on any spot on the main coloring board and you will highlight all required fields to paint the color number needed.
● Almost all content is free - unlockable while gathering more coloring experience (stars) and leveling up or collecting coins. This makes the whole experience a lot more fun!
● There is a daily content posted within the app - make sure you claim it regularly - otherwise past dailies are available only for users which subscribed!
● If you subscribe you will receive plenty of goodies - exclusive content, access to past dailies and all ads will be removed. On top you will support our team as we’re not treating April Coloring as a one-off but a long term project to innovate the coloring evergreen! 
● April Coloring is highly optimized for Apple Pencil. Check all the features that you can benefit from - including pressure and angle sensitivity / double tapping and more!

People all over the world are already enjoying our unique way of coloring  – with over 1 000 000 paintings painted each month! Join them!

If you see anything we can improve, please, let us know! New reviews and support emails are really helpful to make our app better and smarter! Contact us via april@crimsonpine.com

___________________

SUBSCRIPTION INFO
By subscribing, ​you get unlimited access to all premium (marked with diamond) and locked (marked with padlock) paintings.

GOOD TO KNOW
● You can subscribe to a monthly plan (starting at $9.99, billed once a month). Availability and pricing of subscription plans may vary.
● The payment will be charged to your iTunes Account when you confirm the purchase.
● The subscription automatically renews for the same price and duration period as the original plan unless canceled at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
● Free trial automatically converts to a paid subscription unless canceled at least 24-hours before the end of the trial period. From that point onwards, subscription automatically renews unless canceled at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
● You can cancel the subscription or the free trial anytime via the subscription setting through your iTunes account (go to your device settings and tap iTunes & App Store > Apple ID > View Apple ID > enter the password > Subscriptions > Assembly > Cancel Subscription button at the bottom). Do it at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial or subscription period to avoid being charged. Learn more: http://support.apple.com/kb/ht4098
● Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases an April subscription.

Terms of Service: http://www.aprilcoloringapp.com/terms-of-service/
Privacy Policy: http://www.aprilcoloringapp.com/privacy-policy/

apps.title: Ant Art Tycoon
apps.description:
You are an out of luck art dealer with nothing to your name but 5 highly trained ants. Now it's time to put them to work, together they will create beautiful paintings that you can sell for big $$$

ANT FARMER
Grow your ant colony by buying bigger and faster ants, and watch proudly as they create better and better artwork before your very eyes. Before you know it you'll have hundreds of ants creating new art in seconds.

ART DEALER
Watch the public's reaction to your paintings and adjust the sale prices to make the biggest profit possible! People don't like the painting? Reduce the price and get rid of it. People love the painting? Let's see how high we can raise the price!

apps.title: Smartist: Art Preview on Wall
apps.description:
Designed by artists for artists, Smartist is the ultimate AI-powered art visualization app that helps creators transform their artwork into stunning, marketable mockups in minutes. Simply upload your painting, drawing, or digital art, and let Smartist superimpose it into hundreds of beautifully curated interior design spaces—from cozy home decor settings to sleek gallery walls. Customize colors, frames, and layouts, then share directly to Instagram, Etsy, or other social media platforms.

WHY SMARTIST?
Artists who showcase their art in realistic room designs sell faster. Smartist’s exclusive interior AI library features 1500+ mockup-ready spaces—residential rooms, gallery walls, commercial spaces, and seasonal layouts—all designed in-house and updated weekly.

No Photoshop, complex calculations, or expensive equipment needed! With Smartist’s intuitive smart tools, you can:
- Visualize artwork in photorealistic room decor
- Adjust lighting, shadows, and colors automatically
- Experiment with wall paint colors using our paint visualizer
- Arrange multiple pieces in grid layouts
- Customize frames, mats, and wall textures
- Add decorative objects or people for a lived-in feel
- Upload your own room photos for personalized mockups

ARTISTS, DESIGNERS, ART GALLERIES, and Etsy sellers use Smartist to:
- Upgrade their portfolio
- Stand out on social media
- Streamline admin tasks
- Convince art collectors with stunning in situ previews

THE MOST POWERFUL ART MOCKUP TOOLS
- 1500+ interiors—homes, galleries, offices & more
- 20+ new spaces added every week
- Smart cropping & auto-sizing for perfect proportions
- Customizable walls (paint, textures) & floors
- Framex-style framing & mat options
- Moveable decor & people for realism
- Grid mode for multi-artwork displays
- Popular social media image sizes for easy sharing
- Export high-res pictures for prints

HOW TO CREATE A SELL-WORTHY ART MOCKUP
1. Upload your artwork or snap it in-app
2. Input dimensions & adjust colors for accuracy
3. Place it in 1500+ interiors or your own room
4. Customize walls, lighting, and angles
5. Frame your art or customize edge colors
6. Add objects for a realistic touch
7. Export & share instantly—sell smarter!

SHOWCASE YOUR ART, EFFORTLESSLY
You focus on creating—let Smartist handle the selling! Download free (with basic features) or upgrade to Smartist Pro for unlimited interiors, smart tools, and customizations.

Terms of use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

We can’t wait to see what you create. Share your Smartist mockups on social media and tag @smartistapp for a chance to be featured by us.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
New Updates Every Week!
We’re constantly enhancing Smartist with exciting new interiors, customization options, and performance boosts to make your experience even better.

What’s new this time?
- Smoother performance & bug fixes
- Minor improvements for a seamless experience

Love Smartist? Let us know what you’d like to see next! 
support@smartist.app

Thanks for being part of our creative community!

apps.title: Connects: Arts+Culture
apps.description:
With the Bloomberg Connects app, explore interactive guides to over 1000+ museums, galleries, gardens, and cultural spaces from the palm of your hand. From behind-the-scenes guides to artist and expert-curated video and audio content, Bloomberg Connects makes it easy to discover arts and culture – anytime, anywhere.

• Plan and Discover: Prepare for your visit with our planning tools, then use the lookup numbers onsite for quick information about an unexpected find.

• On-Demand Content: Use the app onsite or on its own to bring exhibitions and collections to life with exclusive multimedia content created by our museum collaborators.

Bloomberg Philanthropies created the app to help make the art and offerings of cultural organizations more accessible – not just to those visiting in person but to people around the world.

Use the app to discover museums and cultural spaces worldwide including —The Andy Warhol Museum, Brooklyn Museum, Central Park Conservancy, The Dalí, Denver Art Museum, The Frick Collection, Georgia O’Keeffe Museum, Guggenheim, ICA/Boston, Maison Européenne de la Photographie (MEP), The Met, MoMA, National Portrait Gallery (London), New York Botanical Garden, Noguchi Museum, The Phillips Collection, Serpentine, Storm King Art Center, Whitney Museum of American Art, Yorkshire Sculpture Park and more.

Bloomberg Connects benefits our partners – over 1000+ museums, galleries, gardens, and cultural spaces, with more joining every month – by providing a pre-built, easy-to-use app interface that can be customized to their content and mission. 

For more arts and culture inspo, follow @bloombergconnects on Instagram, Facebook, and Threads. 

Have feedback? Let us know: feedback@bloombergconnects.org

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: Art Space: Artwork Preview App
apps.description:
Introducing Art Space, the newest app from the creators of Drawing Desk. Art Space empowers you to create stunning commercial art mockups in just minutes. Simply upload your artwork, choose from hundreds of customizable interiors, and share your creations with ease. It’s the next big step in your creative journey.

Designed for artists looking to elevate their work, Art Space offers powerful tools for creating professional art mockups that assist artists in selling or displaying their creations. Artists can use Art Space to Enhance their portfolio, stand out on social media, and impress collectors - all from a single app.

Forget about complicated software, pricey equipment, complex tools, or exhibition spaces. With Art Space, all you need is your artwork and your mobile device. Featuring exclusive interiors, limitless customization options, and intuitive smart tools, you can display your art from anywhere.

*NEW* - AI Interior Editor
Transform real spaces into custom art mockups with the power of AI.
- Upload or snap a photo of any interior
- AI detects and highlights objects in the scene
- Instantly remove or reposition objects
- Customize the space to suit your artwork

FEATURES
- 250+ residential, gallery, commercial, and studio interiors, etc
- Ability to upload custom interiors
- Add/customize watermark with multiple fonts, styles, designs, colors, textures, gradients, and positions
- Realistic artwork proportions in all interiors or the ability to adjust the dimensions manually
- Crop functionality and other easy-to-use tools
- Adjust exposure, contrast, warmth, saturation, shadows, and more on spaces and artworks
- Customize and choose colors with grid, spectrum, and sliders
- Choose from multiple frame colors, materials, sizes, and more
- 10+ backdrop designs to choose from
- Grid layouts to arrange multiple artworks 
- Customizable wall and floor colors and textures
- Custom frames and mats for any artwork size
- Moveable artwork functionality with precise and guided measurements
- Popular image sizes for easy sharing
- Supports family sharing features
- Export as JPG, PNG or PSD
- Cloud save option
- And much more!

HOW TO CREATE YOUR ART MOCKUP
- Art Space lets you easily stage your artwork in collector-worthy settings
- Upload your artwork or Spaces
- Add dimensions and tweak colors for a lifelike view
- Stage artwork in 250+ interiors or use your own real-life space
- Customize interiors by adjusting colors, textures, lighting, and angles 
- Pick a frame and mat or customize the sides of an unframed piece 
- Export in required sizes and share instantly

Artists pour their heart and soul into their creations - let Art Space make it easier to sell them! Download Art Space for free and enjoy access to basic features and select interiors. Upgrade to Art Space Premium to unlock over 100+ exclusive art spaces, a vast library of interiors, advanced smart tools, layout frames, and endless customization options. We’re excited to see what you create and would love to hear your feedback!
Get Art Space Premium

Unlimited access to all the premium features & daily content updates during the subscription period. The Weekly subscription is $6.99 per week and Yearly subscription is $69.99 per year (subscription price is in $USD)

You may cancel a subscription or free trial anytime via the subscription setting through your iTunes account. Hello Artists,

We are excited to introduce powerful new AI features to elevate your creative workflow.

We have redefined how you create professional mockups With AI Interior Editor. Snap or upload any interior photo, and instantly transform it into a customizable environment. Our AI intelligently detects objects, allowing you to reposition or remove them, turning any space into an editable canvas for your artwork.

And also you can achieve flawless mockups with lifelike precision with Smart Cropping feature. It auto-adjusts angles to ensure your art blends naturally onto any surface, even at tricky perspectives. Perfect for realistic placements on walls, frames, and more!

Join our community of artists and share your feedback with us. We're constantly working to improve and expand Art Space to help you succeed. Get started today and take your art to new heights!
raw_data.description:
Introducing Art Space, the newest app from the creators of Drawing Desk. Art Space empowers you to create stunning commercial art mockups in just minutes. Simply upload your artwork, choose from hundreds of customizable interiors, and share your creations with ease. It’s the next big step in your creative journey.

Designed for artists looking to elevate their work, Art Space offers powerful tools for creating professional art mockups that assist artists in selling or displaying their creations. Artists can use Art Space to Enhance their portfolio, stand out on social media, and impress collectors - all from a single app.

Forget about complicated software, pricey equipment, complex tools, or exhibition spaces. With Art Space, all you need is your artwork and your mobile device. Featuring exclusive interiors, limitless customization options, and intuitive smart tools, you can display your art from anywhere.

*NEW* - AI Interior Editor
Transform real spaces into custom art mockups with the power of AI.
- Upload or snap a photo of any interior
- AI detects and highlights objects in the scene
- Instantly remove or reposition objects
- Customize the space to suit your artwork

FEATURES
- 250+ residential, gallery, commercial, and studio interiors, etc
- Ability to upload custom interiors
- Add/customize watermark with multiple fonts, styles, designs, colors, textures, gradients, and positions
- Realistic artwork proportions in all interiors or the ability to adjust the dimensions manually
- Crop functionality and other easy-to-use tools
- Adjust exposure, contrast, warmth, saturation, shadows, and more on spaces and artworks
- Customize and choose colors with grid, spectrum, and sliders
- Choose from multiple frame colors, materials, sizes, and more
- 10+ backdrop designs to choose from
- Grid layouts to arrange multiple artworks 
- Customizable wall and floor colors and textures
- Custom frames and mats for any artwork size
- Moveable artwork functionality with precise and guided measurements
- Popular image sizes for easy sharing
- Supports family sharing features
- Export as JPG, PNG or PSD
- Cloud save option
- And much more!

HOW TO CREATE YOUR ART MOCKUP
- Art Space lets you easily stage your artwork in collector-worthy settings
- Upload your artwork or Spaces
- Add dimensions and tweak colors for a lifelike view
- Stage artwork in 250+ interiors or use your own real-life space
- Customize interiors by adjusting colors, textures, lighting, and angles 
- Pick a frame and mat or customize the sides of an unframed piece 
- Export in required sizes and share instantly

Artists pour their heart and soul into their creations - let Art Space make it easier to sell them! Download Art Space for free and enjoy access to basic features and select interiors. Upgrade to Art Space Premium to unlock over 100+ exclusive art spaces, a vast library of interiors, advanced smart tools, layout frames, and endless customization options. We’re excited to see what you create and would love to hear your feedback!

apps.title: Anime Art: AI Photo Generator
apps.description:
Unleash your creative potential with Anime AI – Your Ultimate AI Artistic Creation Companion! Effortlessly transform prompts into stunning AI-generated art or captivating tattoo designs. Enter a description, select your style, and let Anime AI bring your imagination to life in seconds!

Key Features:

► TURN WORDS INTO AI ART - TEXT TO IMAGE GENERATION
Enter any text or description in the prompter at the top of the interface, like "skull," "water and fire," "galaxy resembling millions of butterflies," or "cat tea ceremony in an old town road." Anime AI, trained with millions of images, turns your imagination into breathtaking AI art in seconds.

► TRANSFORM PHOTOS INTO AI ART
Add a photo as a visual base for your prompt. Upload an image, and let Anime AI convert it into captivating AI-generated renderings, timeless AI paintings, mesmerizing AI pixel art, and much more.

► NEWEST AI ART MODELS
Now supporting Flux 1.1 Pro, Stable Diffusion 3.5, GPT Image, Imagen 4, Seedream 3 and more! Experience the latest advancements in AI-generated art for even more detailed and expressive creations.

► DIVERSE AI ARTISTIC STYLES
Anime AI offers a wide variety of AI art styles to explore, allowing endless possibilities for your creativity. Experiment with AI styles like Manga, Fantasy, 90s Anime, Realistic, Painting, Pixel Art, Cyberpunk, Poster Art, Line Art, Comic, Graffiti, and more! Create stunning AI art in any style that suits your vision.

► ANIME IMAGE GENERATOR
Love anime? Now you can generate your very own AI anime-inspired images! Simply enter your ideas, and Anime AI will bring them to life in unique AI anime styles, ranging from classic anime characters to more experimental and fantasy-driven AI designs.

Why Choose Our App

- FINE-TUNE YOUR AI MASTERPIECE
For those seeking more control, use advanced AI art settings like Steps, Negative Prompts, Image Strength, and CFG Scale to refine your AI creations.

- FIND INSPIRATION WITH PREDEFINED AI ART PROMPTS
Explore a collection of predefined AI-generated art prompts to jumpstart your creative journey. Discover endless AI art inspiration that resonates with your creative style.

- HIGH-QUALITY AI ART UPSCALING
Enhance your AI creations by upscaling images to 4K resolution without losing detail, ensuring your AI art looks flawless in every pixel.

- CUSTOMIZE AI ART ASPECT RATIOS
Select from various aspect ratios to ensure your AI-generated artwork perfectly matches your vision and design needs.

Experience Anime AI Premium for Unlimited AI Art Creativity
Unlock unlimited AI art features by subscribing to Anime AI Premium. Subscriptions are available on a weekly or yearly basis.

Privacy Policy: https://sites.google.com/tinyleo.com/privacy-policy/

Terms of Use: https://sites.google.com/tinyleo.com/terms-of-use

Contact Us: https://sites.google.com/tinyleo.com/contact-us

apps.title: Passpartout: Starving Artist
apps.description:
Even you can become a great artist! Wrestle subjectivity as you attempt to sell your art to rude customers in order to progress in this confusing art scene. The only thing threatening you is your expensive wine and baguette addiction! Will your art end up in the Louvre or on your parents' fridge?


Passpartout puts you into the shoes of a French artist trying to navigate the beautifully confusing art scene. Paint and sell your own art to survive your expensive baguette addiction.


Features
- Paint your own masterpieces! Even you can become the next Van Gogh!
- Battle with subjectivity and try to charm a variety of self-proclaimed art connoisseurs without losing your "artistic integrity"!
- Survive your wine and baguette bills. Will your addiction to baguettes be your downfall?
- Unlock fancier galleries and customers!
- Experience the French art world through a living puppet theater!
- Includes an amazing soundtrack by our favourite groovin' dinosaurs Synkronosaurus


Terms of Use: https://www.flamebaitgames.com/terms-of-use/
Privacy Policy: https://www.flamebaitgames.com/privacy-cookie-policy/

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

Your Art Gallery:
