apps.title: Art Story: Color Art Puzzle
apps.description:
Unwind with Art Story: Jigsaw Art Puzzle, a free, relaxing and beautifully curated experience where classic literature and captivating hand-drawn art puzzles merge. This isn’t just a game; it’s a journey through a novel approach to jigsaw puzzles, a relaxing retreat for art lovers, and a celebration of timeless stories.

Enchanting Features for Relaxation:

- Jigsaw Puzzles meet Coloring: Engage with over 1,200 uniquely designed jigsaw puzzles, each piece a part of a beautiful, hand-drawn picture. Find peace in every slot filled and delight in the serene sense of accomplishment with each completed picture.
- Coloring with a Twist: Revel in the joy of coloring, blending your artistic flair into hand-drawn beautiful art works, and witness your art spring to life with calming animations - a testament to the aesthetic charm of Art Story.
- Classic Literature Immersion: Immerse yourself in the narrative depths of classic novels, each jigsaw puzzle unravelling a piece of beloved stories, lovingly retold with touches of elegance and simplicity while staying true to the classic originals.
- Calming Visuals and Anti-stress Gameplay: Free your mind with an anti-stress adventure jigsaw game designed for tranquility. Our puzzle animations are a calming balm, soothing your senses with every art piece you complete.
- Hand-picked Soundtracks: Each puzzle is complemented by curated music, complementary hand-picked to match the story's mood, enhancing your immersive experience within this free jigsaw puzzle game.
- Collect and Solve: Earn Ink Drops coins to unlock novel puzzles and stories. Collect all the cards and build your own novel library as you advance.
- Hand-drawn Stories to Life: Every puzzle tells a story. Beautiful, hand-drawn scenes from classic novels invite you to a world of aesthetic storytelling - a relaxing escape into stories that shape our culture.
- Daily Challenges and Beautiful Rewards: Face new puzzles with our Daily Challenges, each a chance to add more beautiful, hand-drawn artwork to your collection. Unwind with our Daily Challenges and find solace in the art of stress relief.

With Art Story: Jigsaw Art Puzzle game, enrich your daily routine with a curated selection of relaxing puzzles, coloring pages, and hand-drawn stories. This game is a escape haven designed to provide stress relief and enrich your life with art and classic narratives.

Ready to craft your peace? Download ""Art Story: Jigsaw Art Puzzle"" now and let your daily stresses melt away with every piece placed. Your journey into the art of relaxation awaits!

===
Information about the auto-renewal of subscription:

This is an auto-renewable subscription. A subscription is valid for 1 week, or 1 month, depending on the subscription type selected.

- Payment will be changed to the user's iTunes Account upon confirmation of purchase.
- The subscription will automatically renew every week unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current payment period. If auto-renew remains active during that time, the user's account will be charged.
- Subscription can be managed by the user; auto-renewal can be turned off in the user's iTunes Account Settings after purchase.
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. The cost depends on the selected plan.

For more information, please refer to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

- Privacy Policy: [https://artstory.helpdocsonline.com/privacy](https://artstory.helpdocsonline.com/privacy)
- Terms of Use: [https://artstory.helpdocsonline.com/terms](https://artstory.helpdocsonline.com/terms)

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Performance increased.
- Issues & bugs fixed.
 
We are always checking for feedbacks, please share with us via artstory@yomi.studio

apps.title: Gallery: Coloring book & decor
apps.description:
Mia is a passionate painter, who left her boring job to do what she really likes - draw pictures side by side with her boyfriend Leo. Join them in amazing colorful adventure: color a beautiful masterpieces, get stars to renovate the old house and abandoned Art Gallery.

Discover hundreds of unique, high quality paintings, made by the best modern illustrators exclusively for Gallery: Coloring book and Decor. Draw, renovate, decorate and follow the love story - this is the first artbook game where you can color by number and do home design in a one game.

Meet next special features: 
- original gameplay: combination of coloring book and home design - creative game for real designers
- hundreds of beautiful pictures to colour
- different art styles of illustrations: geometric art, flat art, pixelart, low poly
- different choices of decor
- unique 3D graphics for the mansion and characters; 
- relaxing pictures recoloring; 
- regular updates

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING AND TERMS


Premium Subscription


Subscription options, prices and durations:


Weekly Premium Subscription for 7.99 USD with 3 days of a free trial period that offers a weekly subscription for getting daily free coins’ and boosters’ rewards, making decor options free, 2x extending energy bar and removing ADS.

Subscription renewal:

- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase;
- Subscription automatically renews with the price and duration period as the original “1 week” package unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period;

apps.title: Voxel: Pixel Art Coloring
apps.description:
Voxel brings you innovative 3D and new 2D coloring experience, much more vivid and interesting than traditional number coloring book! Download and enjoy!
 
Special Themes, Cute Animals, People,Monsters, Food, Fashion, Ocean, and many other coloring pages for you to color. Generate cool time-lapse video and share it out with your friends or family members.

Features:
- Daily updated new templates. Give you a fresh coloring experience each day;
- 2D templates. Voxel provides you a new “2D” coloring experience with Color by number. If you’d like to try a new style of “2D” coloring games, you can’t miss Voxel!
- 3D Templates and AR Effects. Color beautiful and fun 3D models, and color in augmented reality as well. So cool!
- Coloring tools. Use Bomb to color the blocks nearby and use search tool to find the remaining blocks. You can also change the color to whatever you want on palette.
- Educational
It is important that even youngest can color in 3D, so that they become more aware of what a real world means. Having real objects colored, also, can get the children to better understand what they are studying.

***Voxel Unlimited Subscriptions***

You can subscribe for Voxel Unlimited Subscriptions to all features and content offered for purchase within the app.

•Voxel offers weekly, monthly and annual subscriptions. The subscription prices are: 

(i) $9.99 / Week (After the 3 Days Free Trial)
(ii) $19.99 / Month
(iii) $49.99 / Year

•You can subscribe to a yearly plan ($49.99 billed once a year), a monthly plan ($19.99 billed once a month) or a weekly plan that comes with a free 3 days trial ($9.99 billed once a week after the free trial expires). The prices are in US dollars. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.

•Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.

•Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.

•Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal.

•Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.

•Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

How do I restore Voxel subscriptions on new devices?

You can tap the 'Restore' button on the subscription page.


Terms of use:https://s3.amazonaws.com/common.files/voxel/Terms+of+Use.md

Privacy policy: https://s3.amazonaws.com/common.files/voxel/Privacy+Policy.md

Voxel Team

apps.title: European painting HD.
apps.description:
Virtual gallery of paintings by European painters. 

History of Western European Art has of thousands of paintings from famous and not so famous artists. Many pictures presented in App, you will not find in any other museum in the world. Collectors hunts for unique paintings and pays billions of dollars for the right to be the sole owner.

Our application gives you the opportunity to contemplate the rare paintings in all their grandeur and color.

CUSTOMERS REVIEWS

“The pictures are just beautiful. Wonderful App to expose myself to art through the ages. Each picture tells a story.” - Clary Sage 

“Wonderful selection of paintings. Each is rendered in remarkable detail and outstanding color. The HD version was made for the new iPad.” – prometheusunbound 

“I am fascinated by this gallery app. When I first looked through it, I thought: "Why didn't anyone think of this before?" I recommend it.” - Adarius

KEY FEATURES
- 200 paintings of more than 100 masters of painting
- Separation of paintings by genres and authors
- Access to the HD version of works, download paintings  into the Photo Album

- Email paintings to your friends
- Convenient search for paintings

- Adding paintings to My favorites
- Custom works filter
- Slideshow Mode

- Download paintings for the offline viewing
- Zoom of Paintings

Enjoy your viewing!

apps.title: AI Drawing & Art - Stylus.ai
apps.description:
Stylus.ai - Unleash Your Imagination with AI-Driven Image Generation

Explore the infinite possibilities of your creativity with Stylus.ai, the advanced AI-driven image generator tailored for any visual style. Perfect for enthusiasts of graphic design, fine arts, or any visual medium, Stylus.ai transforms your concepts into stunningly detailed images. Whether you’re a hobbyist or a professional designer, our app offers a seamless and engaging way to create eye-catching visuals right at your fingertips.

Features:

Text-to-Image Transformation: Simply type in your idea, and watch as Stylus.ai brings it to life with beautiful, high-quality images. From abstract patterns to realistic scenes, the possibilities are endless.
Image-Based Innovation: Take any photograph to the next level. Upload an existing image and let Stylus.ai reimagine it in any visual style you choose, enhancing its appeal and impact.
Personalized Avatars and Portraits: Transform your selfies or any photo into customized artistic avatars. Great for social media profiles or just for personal enjoyment!
Custom Wallpapers and Panoramas: Create unique wallpapers and expansive panoramas directly from text prompts. Perfect for personalizing your devices or decorating your digital spaces.
Simple Pricing, No Surprises: Enjoy access to all features with our straightforward pricing model. No complicated tiers, just unlimited creative potential.
Seamless Sharing and Export: Easily share your creations with friends or export them to use across various platforms and devices.
Full System Integration: Designed for iPhone and iPad, Stylus.ai supports iOS dark mode and optimizes for other system features to ensure a smooth user experience.
Whether you're looking to express your creativity, generate unique visual content, or simply explore new imagery, Stylus.ai is your ideal companion. Experience the thrill of creation without the need for extensive artistic skills and let Stylus.ai turn your text and photos into impressive images.

Download Stylus.ai today and start creating the unimaginable!

Terms of Service: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula

apps.title: Pixel By Number® - Pixel Art
apps.description:
Pixel By Number - Pixel Art is a top entertaining game loved by all ages. With a colorful range of colors, these paintings will melt your stress away.  Let's discover more than 10,000 FREE and FASCINATING 2D artworks or create your own pixel art. Paint by number, relax and have fun with Pixel By Number - Pixel Art game!

You will entering a world of coloring meditation with a wide range of colorful artworks and you do not need to decide which color to use but only follow Pixel By Number and have fun.

HOW TO PLAY:

- Tap a color number and start painting the picture
- Tap or use two fingers to drag to zoom in and out

GAME FEATURES:

- 15+ topics for any taste: Food, Cute, Game, Fantasy, Mandalas and many others
- 10,000+ pictures in gallery to choose from. And new pictures to paint by number
- Coloring boosters are refilled automatically to help you finish detailed pictures easily.
- Auto-suggest similar pictures based on your interests
- Pixelate your own photos with Pixel by Number camera. Totally easy and free. Upload your pictures, adjusting the difficulty and have fun coloring your own pictures!
- Share your time-lapse coloring videos on Facebook, Instagram,... with just one tap. Show everyone that you're true artists!
- Unique seasonal pictures for each holiday. Build your own collection of images from popular coloring topics, such as Christmas, Halloween, Thanksgiving, and many more.

TIPS TO COLOR EASIER:

- Pick Color Bucket to quickly fill areas with colors or Magic Wand to paint by number a range of cells of the same color.
- Hold the finished picture to recolor.
- Remove Ads with one purchase only.


ABOUT US:

- Official Facebook Group: www.facebook.com/groups/pixelbynumber/


Let's start playing anti-stress coloring games and unleash your talented inner artist! And leave anxiety behind with the Pixel by Number coloring games!

From Pixel By Number with love 

Pixel By Number Premium

Pixel By Number Premium Subscription allows you to unlock everything, use unlimited coloring boosters and remove ads.

apps.title: Milan Art
apps.description:
Milan Art Institute is a private artist community exclusively for Mastery Program students and customers. Connect with like-minded artists, ignite inspiration, and refine your craft with expert resources designed for all skill levels.

Showcase your artwork and receive valuable feedback from fellow artists worldwide. Build connections and discover artists in your local area. Access your purchased courses and materials in one convenient place. Enhance your skills through specialized Masterclasses, in-depth art courses, and free monthly workshops.

Mastery Program students unlock exclusive benefits, including group coaching and mentorship, an extensive library of bonus content, and monthly art contests where students can submit assignments for a chance to win cash prizes and art store gift cards in multiple categories.

For graduates seeking continued professional growth, we host the Society of Professional Artists (SOPA) within the app—an exclusive membership offering ongoing opportunities, networking, and career support.

This community is only available to those enrolled in our programs. Download the app to access your courses and connect with a global network of dedicated artists.

apps.title: Art of Conquest : Airships
apps.description:
A magic land with various races, terrains, and species!

[Five main races to satisfy players]
Players can switch freely between five main races, Human, Dwarve, Lich, Rakan, and Sylvani, to satisfy their own preferences.

[Explore a magical world freely]
Explore Nore, Drake, and Sait freely. The diverse terrains, mystical creatures, and interesting events will satisfy your curiosity about this magical world!

[Real-time combat controls]
Deploy troops freely and manually cast hero skills in real-time battles to decide the final victor!

[Two beautiful and trendy art styles]
New Anime style for a new visual experience! Switch between the original and new art style with one tap. One of them will suit you whether you like it realistic or Anime-like!


Automatic Subscription Renewal in Art of Conquest
• Subscription content: When you purchase an in-game subscription, you will gain access to the following subscription rewards:
1.	Building Queue Limit +2
2.	Upgrade Queue Limit +2
3.	Free Rush +10 minutes
4.	Shield Time +2 hours
• Subscription period: 1 month (monthly subscription)
• Subscription price: $1.99/month
• Payment: Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
• Cancellation: To cancel a subscription, on your device please go to Settings - iTunes & App Stores - Apple ID - View Apple ID - Subscriptions and turn off automatic renewal at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period.
• Renewal: Your iTunes account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before the current period ends. Once the payment is processed, your in-game subscription will be extended for another month.

apps.title: Linearity Curve Graphic Design
apps.description:
Vector drawing. Vector art. Graphic design. SVG. Vectorize in seconds. Linearity Curve is a modern vector drawing program and complete Graphic Design Software for iPhone, iPad, and Mac. Sketch with Apple Pencil, refine curves with Bézier tools, and use the built-in SVG converter to turn sketches or photos into clean, production-ready vector drawing format files. Whether you’re working on logos, icons, illustrations, UI assets, or social campaigns, Curve is the vector art program that gives you speed, precision, and control.


▶ Vector drawing & graphic design tools
- Bézier Pen and Node tools for smooth, editable curves
- Shape Builder, booleans, grids, and smart guides for clean layouts
- Professional typography: kerning, tracking, variable fonts, OpenType features
- Multiple artboards for logos, posters, UI visuals, and complete campaigns


▶ Vectorize & export with SVG converter
- Auto Trace instantly vectorize sketches or images into editable paths
- Export clean SVG drawing format with organized strokes, fills, and groups
- PDFs for print, PNG/JPG for everywhere, plus built-in SVG converter tools
- RGB & CMYK output for screen and print workflows


▶ Optimized for iOS 26
- Pencil-first vector drawing program: tilt, pressure, and gesture support
- Seamless sync across iPhone, iPad & Mac with version history
- Native Mac performance with Silicon acceleration
- Full Liquid Glass interface on iOS 26 — a new era of design clarity and flow


▶ Start fast, finish polished
- Thousands of ready-made templates for logos, posts, slides, and presentations
- Built-in stock photos and vector illustration programs for faster starts
- Tutorials and contextual tips to learn as you work


▶ Collaborate & share
- Shared workspaces for real-time collaboration
- Comments, versioning, and share links for team feedback


▶ Works with your files
- Import and export industry formats (.ai, JPEG, SVG, PDF, PNG, JPG)
- Export presets for apps, web, social, and print-ready assets
- Import projects directly from popular design software like Illustrator, Figma, and Sketch with ease.

▶ Perfect for
- Branding systems and logo design with Vector Design Software
- Marketing graphics and visuals with vector design programs
- Vector art program workflows for icons, illustrations, and infographics
- Print-ready posters, brochures, and layouts with vector illustration programs
- Digital products, UI assets, and professional graphic design software projects


▶ Why creators choose Curve
- Clarity — a streamlined vector design software toolkit
- Control — edit every node; curves stay crisp at any scale
- Speed — instant SVG converter actions and smarter defaults
- Continuity — sketch on iPad, refine on Mac, review on iPhone
- Confidence — export clean vector drawing format files


▶ FAQ — quick answers

Can I do vector drawing with Apple Pencil?
 Yes. Curve is optimized for tilt, pressure, and gestures so vector art feels natural.

Can I vectorize images into SVG with an SVG converter?
 Yes. Auto Trace is a built-in SVG converter that creates editable paths for clean SVG export.

Is this a vector art program or full Graphic Design Software?
 Both. Curve is a vector drawing program that scales into professional Graphic Design Software.

Does it support vector illustration programs?
 Yes. Curve is one of the most versatile vector illustration programs, built for icons, logos, and layouts.

Can I design offline?
 Yes. Work offline and sync when you reconnect.

Will my SVG exports be clean?
 Yes. Exports preserve structure, groups, and geometry for production-ready vector drawing format.

Does it support CMYK for print?
 Yes. Work in RGB or CMYK and export press-ready files.

▶Questions or feedback?

 Reach out at support@linearity.io
 Privacy policy: linearity.io/privacy-policy
 Follow us: YouTube, LinkedIn, Instagram, X & TikTok (@linearityhq).

raw_data.releaseNotes:
This update includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

---
We are on a mission to empower designers with the ultimate tools for bringing ideas to life. Our software is constantly evolving, but we need your feedback to improve even more. Whether you have a question, opinion, or an idea, we want to hear it! Contact us directly in the Linearity Forum or email us at support@linearity.io. If you enjoy using Linearity Curve, please rate the app and share your review. Thank you for being part of our community!

apps.title: ArtClvb
apps.description: ArtClvb is a specialized Market Network created for the art world, combining social networking and marketplace features. With ArtClvb, artists, collectors, curators, galleries, and individuals involved in the art ecosystem can create profiles to showcase artworks they've collected, curated, or created while also fostering meaningful connections. These user profiles offer a seamless experience that supports both primary and secondary sales of artists' work, ensuring that royalties are properly distributed. Additionally, ArtClvb enables users to coordinate studio visits, facilitates the scanning of public art to connect to artists' profiles, and aids collectors in discovering local artists, galleries, and art openings, all within the app.

raw_data.releaseNotes: Design categories added in anticipation of Art Fair 2025 in Detroit.

apps.title: iArtView: Art to Scale Gallery
apps.description:
The advanced viewing and selling solution for artists, galleries, collectors and interior designers to instantly view and buy/sell artworks on personal wall spaces, no measuring! Fast and easy to use. Import images of art, shoot a photo, start sharing your new walls and selling your art! Sell original artworks, your own fine art prints, or enable iArtView prints and wall art in one click. 

Whatever your medium - fine artist, photographer, mixed media painter or digital artist, iArtView will help your art look fantastic. This app is the perfect tool for artists who want to sell more art.

Features:
iArtView allows artists to sell original artwork
iArtView automatically scales artwork to your wall space. No need to measure.
View single or multiple artworks on your personal walls.
Not near your wall? No problem! Select one of the designer interiors provided.
Adjust lighting
Alter the perspective and angle of your art on the wall.
Choose a frame and mat combination from our contemporary selection.
Get inspired! Choose a new wall color with the scaleable Color Wall.
Save art-on-wall images to your camera roll or email for handy future reference.
Share walls with clients and friends via email, text, Airdrop
Share to all platforms like Facebook, Pinterest, Twitter,
Purchases are a breeze. Buy and sell artworks directly in the app. Receive commission on prints made via iArtView. No fees for listing artworks.
Favourite the art you love the most
Place Favourite artworks on interior walls to find your favourite combination
Professional and varied social media content creation is easy
Save time on styling your beautiful quality content for social media by utilising our designer interiors
New interiors and frames added regularly
Additional features for paid subscribers: 
Customize gallery profile screen with gallery logo, information and GPS map directions.
Discover tab where buyers will discover your art and you can find new art to be inspired by

apps.title: Aivi: Ai Art & Photo Generator
apps.description:
Discover Aivi where your imagination takes flight, and your words blossom into a spectacle of visual art. In a blend of wonder and technology, Aivi redefines the creative process, translating text prompts into a gallery of AI-generated masterpieces.


► Imagine and Create with Ease


Ready to visualize a dragon perched atop a skyscraper or a serene village hidden within an enchanted forest? Aivi's advanced AI takes your written concepts and, like an artistic alchemist, turns them into rich, high-quality, detailed, and evocative images that push the boundaries of digital art.


► Diverse Styles for Every Vision


Whether you seek the sharp edges of a futuristic cityscape, the soft hues of a watercolor painting, or the vibrant lines of a comic book, Aivi offers a plethora of styles to suit your creative impulse. Select from realism, anime, photographic, digital art, 3D-model, fantasy, and more to match the mood and tone of your envisioned scene.


► Crafted to Your Specifications


No matter the platform or purpose, Aivi adapts to your needs with customizable aspect ratios. Choose from square, portrait, or landscape to ensure your AI-generated art fits perfectly in your intended space, from Instagram posts to gallery walls.


► Favorites and Sharing, Simplified


Fall in love with a creation? Add it to your favorites with a single tap. Share your AI-generated art directly from Aivi to your social media or with friends, sparking conversations and inspiring others with images that were once tucked away in your imagination.


► Exclusive AI Art Techniques


At the heart of Aivi lies a core powered by state-of-the-art AI, employing methods like stable diffusion to render images that are not just seen but felt. It's a dance of pixels and algorithms, where your prompts lead to AI art that's uniquely yours.


► A Gallery at Your Fingertips


Each piece of art you create becomes a part of your personal gallery within Aivi. Explore your past creations, draw inspiration from them, and watch as your digital portfolio grows with every idea brought to life.


With Aivi - AI Photo Generator, the realm of AI-generated images opens up to all - artists and dreamers alike. No prior art expertise is required; just bring your ideas, and let Luminart do the rest.


Download Aivi today and step into a world where your words are the brush, AI is the canvas, and every creation is a conversation between technology and artistry. Explore, create, and share with Aivi, where every prompt is a potential masterpiece, just waiting to be discovered.


Experience the future of personalized art creation, and let your creativity soar to new heights. Aivi is not just an app - it's the beginning of an art revolution in your pocket.


Privacy Policy: https://zentropi.app/privacy-policy.html

Terms Of Use: https://zentropi.app/terms-and-conditions.html

apps.title: Artkive - Save Kids' Art
apps.description:
***Featured as an APP OF THE DAY by Apple***

As seen on THE TODAY SHOW, GOOD MORNING AMERICA, in REAL SIMPLE, PARENTS MAGAZINE, and countless other parenting resources, Artkive is the leading and original app to chronologically store, share and print your child's artwork or schoolwork.

Never again feel guilty about throwing away artwork your kids bring home.  Get rid of the clutter and start to enjoy your child's work.   Turn your Artkive into a high quality, hard cover book or other great products with little more than the touch of a button!

Your kids will love flipping through their Artkive books to see their creations, and they make great gifts for grandparents and other loved ones.

Artkive currently offers 3 different membership tiers offering benefits such as free book credits, discounts, and other surprise benefits which offset most, if not all of the cost of membership.  Memberships are only required for users who have used the app for more than 3 months AND have more than 40 images stored.

For more information, check out www.artkiveapp.com or email us at help@artkiveapp.com

Be sure to watch our videos on the site and like us on FB!

Artkive(tm) is a registered trademark of The Kive Company

raw_data.releaseNotes:
• Book Review option was removed from book checkout
• Other Minor bug fixes and performance improvements

Introducing our AI Art Generator: Generate Stunning Art with Midjourney, Stable Diffusion style.

Let your imagination run wild with our AI Art Generator App. Simply enter a prompt and choose an art style, and it will create beautiful wallpapers, images, paintings, and drawings for you in seconds. With AI Image Generator, you can create anything you can imagine. 



► Turn words into art
Do you have a wild idea for a piece of art? Something like a portrait of a person who is both human and animal OR a landscape that is made up of impossible geometries? With AI Art Generator, it can happen in seconds!

Simply provide a description or a phrase, and watch as our AI Image Generator brings it to life in the form of captivating images. For example, turn the words "majestic mountain sunset" into a breathtaking landscape painting, or "galactic adventure" into an otherworldly space scene. 


► Turn photos into AI Art ( Image Remix - Image Variations)
Start with an image as a visual base for your prompt. Simply upload a photo, Select style and watch how this AI Art Generator app transforms it as well as can seamlessly blend multiple images into a harmonious composition. Combine diverse elements, styles, and themes to create unique artworks.


► Edit Image (Inpaint) 
Easily remove unwanted elements from your AI generated Art and enhance your images. Make changes to your images & photos by writing simple instructions. Whatever you want to do, the possibilities are endless. If you want to change the hair color, add a background, or adjust the lighting, you can do it. Take your photos to the next level with AI!

For those who want more control over their art, We offer advanced configurations such as Negative Prompt, Guiding Scale, Denoising Step,  Image Quality, Enhance Prompt and Wide Angle that allow you to fine-tune your creations.

► Inspirations and prompts predefined
Explore a variety of ideas and prompts to spark your creativity. With a wide range of predefined AI-generated art to choose from, you can easily find something that inspires you. Whether you're looking for a realistic portrait, a whimsical landscape, or an abstract expression, there's something for everyone.



AI Art Generator is constantly learning and evolving, hence the possibilities are endless. So what are you waiting for? Start Creating Stunning Arts today!

apps.title: Paper: Sketch, Draw & Create
apps.description:
Over 30 million people set their ideas free with Paper®, the award-winning immersive sketching app.

SKETCH WITH CONFIDENCE
Paper’s perfectly-tuned tools make it easy to sketch, collage, paint, draw—wherever your thoughts take you. Wave goodbye to distracting menus and let natural gestures guide you, keeping you in your creative flow.

GET CREATIVE (WITHOUT THE MESS)
Add multiple photos to a single page and cut, stick, move, and fix without the fuss of complex layers. From mood boards to storyboards, pull in inspiration from anywhere and get your ideas moving.

YOUR IDEAS, YOUR WAY
Wherever and however you get your ideas, it’s never been easier to put them on Paper. Organize pages into beautiful journals and sync them across your devices, ready to pick up where you left off.

CREATE LIKE A PRO
Take creativity to the next level and subscribe to Paper Pro for more tools, features, and journals. Subscription is optional and you can cancel anytime. To upgrade, simply visit the Paper Pro section in your Settings menu.

* Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account once you confirm the purchase.
* Your subscription will automatically renew at the end of your subscription period. To opt out, you must turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
* Manage changes to your subscription in the iTunes Account Settings.
* Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited when you purchase a Paper Pro subscription.

Love Paper? Leave us a review! Thanks to your comments, reviews, and tweets we can continue to evolve Paper with you in mind. 

Questions? Shoot us an email at support@wetransfer.com.

Terms of Service: https://paper.bywetransfer.com/terms 
Privacy Policy: https://paper.bywetransfer.com/privacy 
Patents: https://paper.bywetransfer.com/legal/patents

apps.title: AI Photo Generator: ImgAI
apps.description:
Bring Your Ideas to Life With AI Image Generator ImgAI

Got a cool idea in your head? Just type it out, pick a style, and ImgAI will transform it into stunning AI art in seconds. Whether you're feeling creative or just curious, ImgAI makes it super easy to generate unique, high-quality images. No design skills needed.

What You Can Do With ImgAI:
• Turn words into digital artwork instantly  
• Remix your photos into bold new styles  
• Design custom logos and creative visuals  
• Generate ultra-realistic portraits and images  
• Convert sketches into detailed artwork  
• Create AI selfies in different looks or moods  
• Use Control Center widget or Shortcuts to generate fast (iOS 18 ready)  
• Add Home & Lock Screen widgets for instant image creation  

Key Features

AI IMAGE GENERATOR  
Type your idea and let the AI create. Trained on billions of visuals, ImgAI generates artwork that matches your vision.

STYLE SELECTOR  
Pick a vibe: cartoon, dreamy, realistic, futuristic, and more. Experiment with different styles to find your favorite look.

PERSONALIZED ART FOR ANY SPACE  
Need a wallpaper, vibe board, or print? ImgAI makes custom art just for you. Save in HD and print it if you want.

AI REMIX TOOL  
Upload any photo and reimagine it in a new style. Great for profiles, content, or just for fun.

SKETCH TO IMAGE  
Draw something rough and ImgAI turns it into polished, high-res artwork in seconds.

BUILT-IN SHARING  
Love what you made? Share directly from ImgAI to social platforms and show it off.

Creating AI art has never been faster, easier, or more fun. No complicated tools. Just your ideas and ImgAI’s creativity engine. It’s like having a personal digital artist, always on.

Premium Membership Details  
Download ImgAI free and start exploring. Want more styles, HD downloads, no ads, and grid view? Go Premium.

Subscription Info:
• Payment charged to your iTunes account upon purchase  
• Subscriptions auto-renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period  
• Renewal charges applied within 24 hours before the current period ends  
• Manage your subscription or turn off auto-renew in your iTunes settings  
• Unused portion of any free trial will be forfeited if a subscription is purchased  

By using this app, you confirm you accept our:  
https://www.xrlab.ai/termsofuse  
https://www.xrlab.ai/privacypolicy

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

Thank you for your feedback and for being part of the ImgAI community! If you have suggestions or run into any issues, please let us know. Happy creating!

apps.title: Art Master
apps.description:
From incredible paintings by Jean-Michel Basquiat and Claude Monet to sculptures by Jean Arp and Auguste Rodin, Art Master is the ultimate game for art world enthusiasts.

Pick a category that fits your expertise, whether it be Contemporary Art, Old Masters, Modern Art, Impressionists, or Urban Art. Once selected, you are shown a set of questions asking if you can identify the piece of art created by the artist in question. If you can, then you'll earn points and badges to help prove yourself on the Art Master leaderboard. If you can not, then you'll have the opportunity to educate yourself on the artist by reading detailed biographies and viewing high-quality images of their masterpieces around the world.

"This is one of the best applications I've used to educate myself about the art world." - Kate

Download Art Master today and start proving yourself.

raw_data.releaseNotes: Bug fixes and system improvements.

apps.title: Text Art: Typography & Word
apps.description:
Create beautiful and professional posts, flyers, and posters with Text Art! 

With just a few taps, anyone can create eye-catching graphic design. Simply select a photo, enter a catchy caption, and choose between dozens of designer text styles. Every time you select a style, a new, unique design is generated just for you!

Whether you are looking to spice up your social media account or create professional flyers, Text Art is all you need. And if you plan to print your artworks, you'll be happy to learn that Text Art exports in the highest possible resolution.

What you'll get with Text Art:

- Designer-picked fonts and layout combinations
- Beautiful and unique text art generated just for you
- Hundreds of colors, gradients, and textures
- Million of free professional stock photos
- Large database of inspirational quotes
- Exporting in high resolution

-----------------

While Text Art is free to use, premium access to the app (including all premium text styles) requires a paid subscription. Please see the subscriptions details below.

- The subscription is automatically renewed every month or year until cancelled.
- Your payment will be charged to your iTunes Account as soon as you confirm your purchase.
- You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal from your Apple ID account settings after the purchase.
- Your subscription will renew automatically, unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- The cost of renewal will be charged to your account in the 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.
- When canceling a subscription, your subscription will stay active until the end of the period. Auto-renewal will be disabled, but the current subscription will not be refunded.

About Subscriptions - http://appostrophe.se/textart/subscriptions.html
Terms of Use - http://appostrophe.se/textart/terms.html
Privacy Policy - http://appostrophe.se/textart/privacy.html

apps.title: AI Art Generator: Photo, Draw
apps.description:
Let Your Creativity Flow. Create Unique Amazing AI Generated Images In Seconds!

Want to design a logo for yourself or your work? Want to generate a cartoon, bikini, profile, muscle image for you? Want to have a unique tattoo design? Meet AI Art Generator — your AI companion designed to turn your ideas into stunning artworks.

► Turn Words into Art
Want to see cat in a suit or any cool and wonderful art work? Enter "movie characters, song lyrics, poetry, astronauts, aliens, cityscapes, wonderland, Mars, forests" or whatever you have in mind. AI Art Generator can create stunning paintings in thousands of possible styles, turning your dreams into visual art in seconds, generating remarkable pictures that match your description.

► Turn Photos into Art
AI art generator can turn your photos into stunning works of art with thousands of possible styles. Simply upload a photo or choose one from your gallery, and our AI generator will do the rest! Want to transform into your favorite superhero? Want your cat dressed up as an astronaut and fly to Mars? It's just one click away, create your AI photos instantly!

► AI Tattoo Generator
AI Art Generator offers a range of features to help you create unique tattoos. You can choose from diverse styles like black & white, Japanese, and tribal. The app allows text - based tattoos with customizable fonts. With full - body customization, you can see how tattoos will look on different body parts.

► AI LOGO Maker
Discover our AI logo maker, a game - changing tool for brand creation. It uses AI to generate unique logos based on input like keywords and color preferences. With a wide range of fonts, shapes, and color options, you can customize every aspect of your logo. The AI provides instant design suggestions, ensuring a quick and efficient process. Whether you're a startup, small business, or individual, this tool offers cost - effective and high - quality logo creation. 

► AI Filters
Upgrade your photos and reshape your memories with a range of AI filters. Turn your photos into works of art like cartoons, anime game characters, movie characters, and more. AI Art Generator's AI produces stunning, high-resolution, realistic visuals.

► AI Face Swap
AI Art Generator app will amaze you with the AI face changer. With advanced AI face-swapping technology, the face on your photo can be replaced on another photo and has realistic facial expressions and movements.

◆ SUBSCRIPTION TERMS ◆
One Month Subscription： $19.99/ Month
One Year Subscription：$29.99/ Year
Lifetime Purchase：$39.99

The cancellation will take effect the day after the last day of the current subscription period, and you will be downgraded to the free service.

apps.title: Nail Designs - Manicures & Art
apps.description:
Nail Designs is the perfect app to make your nails look stunning. 

If you ever thought that having plain red nails just looks extremely boring, then this app is exactly for you! 

Nail Designs is the only app of its kind on the App Store and features many nail design tutorials. The designs are specifically chosen so that they can be done by yourself at home in 10 min. Every tutorial consists of step-by-step instructions and high resolution images, each targeted specifically at someone, who is not an expert. And what if you really like a particular design? Mark it as one of your favorites so it's always at your fingertips.

Every tutorial also includes a list of required nail polish colors, so that you never find yourself half through the tutorial and suddenly realise that you are missing that yellow nail polish, that you just emptied last week. And when you're done, you can take a photo of the finished design and upload it to your social networks so that everyone knows, what an artist you are.

The designs are divided into packs of 20 manicure designs and each has its own theme, so there is something to be found for everyone; from casual to crazy party designs and from black elegant styles to cute and adorable ones. First pack is available for free, while each additional pack can be purchased inside the app.

Features: 
- Many great designs to make your nails look stunning
- All designs can be made at home by yourself
- Step-by-step tutorials with images
- Take a photo of your finished design and share it
- Beauty center - everything a woman needs
- Every design comes with a list of required colors

Subscription Plans:

Pro: $9.99 monthly

Please note that prices may vary by location. Subscriptions will be charged to your credit card through your iTunes account.

Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
Privacy Policy: https://kragerlabs.com/privacy.html

By purchasing a subscription, you agree to be bound by the aforementioned Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

apps.title: Spellai - AI Art Maker
apps.description:
Ready to enter AI world? Discover Spellai, the user-friendly app that effortlessly transforms your words into captivating photos and drawings. Prepare to be awestruck by the exceptional image quality, rivaling custom wallpapers.

- Chat Edit Feature: Spellai × Nano Banana
This advanced AI image generation and editing tool, created by Spellai in collaboration with Google DeepMind, is powered by Gemini 2.5 Flash Image (codename “Nano Banana”). At the forefront of AI imaging, it enables unprecedented creation and control through multimodal understanding and conversational interaction. Whether you’re a designer, content creator, or developer, it’s set to transform your workflow!

- Text to AI Art
With our powerful AI editor, you can quickly and easily transform your text into unique photos, from anime-inspired drawings to lifelike photos. Without any experience and skill, you can paint your dream and proudly share these AI arts on social media.

- Turn Images into Video
With our AI-powered tool, you can effortlessly create videos by simply inputting images. Whether you want to describe a scene or make photos move, the AI will generate a stunning video that brings your vision to life. These new features will make video creation simpler than ever!

- Chat with Your AI Friends
Our chatbot can think and respond like a real person, delivering natural and fluid conversations. We offer a diverse selection of chat characters, each with unique expressions and personality traits. Whether you're chatting with anime characters, interacting with game personas, or engaging with lifelike roles, you'll enjoy an immersive experience that rivals real human conversation. Currently, we also provide a character creation feature, allowing you to unleash your creativity and build your own custom chat companions!

- Community Sharing
Now, you can easily share your images rendered with other users in community. Post your amazing photos, get feedback, and inspire others with your creativity. Whether you're showcasing your unique style or building a design portfolio, the community is the perfect place to connect with text-to-image enthusiasts and designers alike.

- Diverse Styles, Lightning-Fast Photo Drawing
Spellai provides a variety of style templates ranging from realistic to anime. With our lightning-fast photo generation, you can paint a stunning photo from your text in no time. Spellai is your best AI art editor and enhancer tool.

- Cartoon Yourself and Perfect Your Avatar World
Tired of the traditional social media profile? Want to create your own cartoon character and cartoon yourself? From anime to realistic style, Spellai is the best photo editor to bring your avatar world to lifelike painting! With the ability to edit detail, you can quickly draw any face and pose you want. Express yourself in avatar world with endless possibilities in more anime-style drawings! 

Unleash your creativity with our pre-made prompts and be amazed by the after-effects. With Spellai, you can transform your text into visually stunning photos that are perfect for social media or even as your device's wallpaper. The possibilities are endless, so join the AI revolution today and see what amazing painting you make with Spellai!

One click, all set in your customizable avatar world. Join the AI revolution and see what stunning drawings, including anime-style ones, you would be amazed by the after-effects from Spellai. Let's make your AI dream come true!

All personal data is protected in accordance with the Policy. We always welcome your thoughts and suggestions. You can contact us via spellai-support@polyversestudio.com.

Terms of Service:
https://aimirror.fun/spellai/terms_of_service
Privacy Policy:
https://aimirror.fun/spellai/policy

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Don’t Miss the Latest Updates in Spellai:
- Enhanced Nano Banana Mode: Supports multiple image uploads.
- Bug Fixes & Interface Optimizations.
We hope you love the new version of Spellai! If you have any questions, contact us at: spellai-support@polyversestudio.com.

apps.title: Star Art: Drawing & Relaxing
apps.description:
Art has not only the power to inspire, but it can also be incredibly relaxing. Breathe deep, clear your mind, and unwind with this ultra-relaxing and endlessly enjoyable puzzle game guaranteed to relieve stress, soothe frayed nerves, prompt ASMR and promote mental wellness.

 Find a sanctuary on your phone and make space to relax with this simple meditative drawing game that calms your brain, delights your eyes, and fires your inspiration.

► Cosmic connections

• It’s all interconnected – glide your fingers across the screen to join numbered stars and create a constellation of beautiful 3D drawings based on origami art. Numbers indicate the connections between each star, so the image develops slowly and organically from your movements on the screen until everything clicks satisfyingly into place.

• Never fear – made a mistake? No worries, just undo your last move and try again. You’ve got all the time in the world and there’s no penalty for trying and failing. The focus of this game is on relaxation and serious artistic fun!

• Infinitely relaxing – progress your way through hundreds of different puzzle drawings, each revealing a unique and carefully designed figure in a wide range of categories.

• Fresh challenges – every day brings a new extended puzzle broken down into stages so that your meditative efforts are eventually rewarded with a satisfying sensation of wholeness when you connect all the numbers, and the final image is revealed.

• Space to breathe – simple ergonomic game design, relaxing ambient music, rich sound effects, and satisfying but discreet haptic responses create a Zen-like environment that will induce ASMR and provide instant relaxation at even the most stressful times.

► At one with the universe

Let your fingers dance across the astral plane, sketching symbols of eternal significance (and some cute animals) between the stars in this soothing, meditative drawing game where each puzzle brings you closer to a state of Zen calm. Feel your body loosen and your mind float free as you draw your way to mental wellness. Download Start Art now to discover instant relaxation and the healing power of art.

Privacy Policy: https://say.games/privacy-policy
Terms of Use: https://say.games/terms-of-use

raw_data.releaseNotes: Bug fixes and performance improvements.

apps.title: ArtStudio - Draw and Paint
apps.description:
*** This is the LEGACY version. ARTSTUDIO PRO, the successor to this app, is available now with many new features and improvements. Find it by searching for “Artstudio Pro” on the Mac/iOS App Store.

ArtStudio is the most comprehensive, sketching, painting and photo editing tool in the App Store. Completely re-designed from the ground up the new ArtStudio features a beautiful new user interface and a powerful new graphics engine to make creating works of art faster, easier, and more fun! Using advanced drawing algorithms this is the fastest and most precise version of ArtStudio to date.

See the video: 
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P__arq3jk3U

Follow us on twitter: http://twitter.com/lucky_clan
Follow us on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LuckyClanApps

Gallery:
http://flickr.com/groups/artstudioimages/

appmodo.com:
"It doesn’t matter whether you’re a skilled artist or a newbie; ArtStudio is for you."

appsmile.com: 5/5
"This is what PhotoShop Mobile wishes it had been."

FEATURES:
- flexible canvas size, max: 3024x4032(iPhone 6s), 3264x2448(iPhone 5/5s/6), 2592×1936 (iPhone 4s, iPhone 4), 2048×1536 (iPhone 3gs) 
- 16 tools: select, pencil, wet paintbrush, dry paintbrush, spray, dots, eraser, smudge, bucket fill, gradient, text, clone, heal, blur/sharpen, dodge/burn, eyedropper
- 450 HIGH QUALITY BRUSHES (150 free, 300 paid) divided into 30 groups
- custom brushes, max size: 500x500px
- select tool: rect/ellipse/lasso/magic wand/by color, add/sub/intersect, contract/expand/round corners/border/...
- text tool: over 150 system fonts, support of external TTF fonts (just upload .ttf file in iTunes using File Sharing), special text layer to easy edit text
- favorites list to quickly access user's favorite brush settings
- fully customizable stroke settings: blur, flip, size, opacity, spacing, fadeout, squeeze, angle, speed-size, speed-opacity, random flip, scatter, jitter-spacing, jitter-angle, jitter-size, jitter-squeeze, jitter-opacity, jitter-hue, jitter-saturation, jitter-lightness
- symmetric drawing
- guidelines, grid
- shapes: lines, rectangles, ellipses, polygons (open, closed)
- layer options: add, duplicate, merge down/visible, delete, lock alpha, show/hide, link, name, reorder, opacity, blending modes
- layer masks
- layer/selection transformations: move/scale/rotate with multi-touch, flip, rotate left/right, fill/erase
- distort (skew, perspective etc)
- 21 layer blending modes: normal, multiply, add, difference, screen, overlay, hue, saturation, color, value, ...
- import from 'Camera Roll', camera, iTunes, clipboard
- export as JPG/PNG/PSD to 'Camera Roll', email, clipboard, iTunes
- multi-touch navigation with unlimited zoom
- undo/redo with almost infinite number of steps
- image resize (none, bilinear, bicubic, lanczos interpolations) , change canvas size, crop
- 40 filters: gaussian/motion/radial blur, sharpen, unsharp mask, add noise, render clouds, edge detect, border/vignette and more
- Elastify filter used to make incredible distortions
- adjustments: brightness/contrast/exposure, hue/saturation/lightness, color balance, temperature, shadows/highlights, CURVES, auto contrast/colors/white balance and more
- video tutorials

## IPAD VERSION AVAILABLE IN APP STORE ##

apps.title: Loopsie: AI Image Effects
apps.description:
Loopsie is your all-in-one video editor and photo generator app for creating stunning, AI-generated & dynamic content that captures attention and turns heads. Whether you’re looking to animate your photos into immersive 3D masterpieces through cinematic motion, create AI videos, or enhance your pictures with vibrant AI effects, Loopsie has everything you need to elevate your creativity.

We update the app weekly with fresh AI effects and presets, ensuring you always have access to the latest AI trends and tools to make your content stand out & go viral.

Key Features You Must Try
Anime Filters – AI Art with a Tap!
Have you ever wondered what you’d look like as an anime character? Loopsie’s AI effects anime generator technology can turn your photos into toon headshots with a single tap. It’s fast, fun, and perfect for creating viral photos & videos that get people talking.
Explore Popular AI Effects & Presets

Choose from a wide variety of AI effects and presets to match any mood or theme. Some of our most-loved options include:

- AI Anime Generator: Turn yourself into your favorite anime character.
- 90’s AI Polaroid: Rediscover the charm of 90’s Polaroids.
- Legends: Add a heroic touch to your visuals.
- Vertigo: Create mesmerizing, dizzying motion AI effects.
- Neon & Sparkle: Light up your photos with vibrant, eye-catching details.
- Cloud, Vaporwave, VHS, Indie: Tap into retro vibes or futuristic aesthetics.

3D Photos – Add Depth and Dimension
Create immersive 3D photos with ease. Use Loopsie’s integrated 3D camera to capture the moment or animate any standard photo into a stunning 3D experience. From classic 360° wiggle AI effects to smooth vertical motions, Loopsie brings your photos to life like never before.

Cutting-Edge AI Technology
- AI-Powered Depth Prediction: Loopsie’s neural network intelligently predicts depth for every photo, giving it a realistic, dimensional look.
- Augmented Reality Stickers: Add 3D stickers that interact with your photos in captivating ways.
- Advanced 3D Scene Reconstruction: Our unique algorithm fills in missing details for a seamless 3D scene.
- 3D Subject Segmentation: Highlight key subjects in your photos with precise AI-powered segmentation.

Discover Loopsie AI Effects Pro – Unlock Your Full Potential
Upgrade to Loopsie AI Effects Pro to access all the premium AI effects, filters, tools, and presets. Whether you’re a casual creator or a content pro, our subscription plans are designed to fit your needs:
Weekly, Monthly, Yearly, or Lifetime Plans
Cancel anytime! Manage your subscription directly in your Account Settings.
Prefer a one-time purchase? Go for our Lifetime Access option for unlimited creativity.

Here’s what makes Loopsie the go-to app for creative viral content:
Intuitive interface that’s easy for beginners yet powerful enough for pros.
A constantly growing library of AI effects and tools updated weekly.
Seamless sharing to all major platforms, including Instagram, TikTok, and more.

Stay Connected with Loopsie
Have questions or feedback? iOS.support@loopsie.it – we’d love to hear from you!
Follow us on Instagram and TikTok (@loopsieapp) for inspiration, tutorials, and the latest updates.

Subscription and Free Trial Policy
Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled 24 hours before the end of the current period.
Manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal via your Account Settings.
Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited upon purchase of a subscription.

Terms and conditions:
https://bit.ly/2PWcXgi

Privacy policy:
https://www.iubenda.com/privacy-policy/8126812

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Thank you for using Loopsie!
We would love to hear your thoughts on this update, please email us at ios.support@loopsie.it.
This update includes some bug fixes.
raw_data.description:
Loopsie is your all-in-one video editor and photo generator app for creating stunning, AI-generated & dynamic content that captures attention and turns heads. Whether you’re looking to animate your photos into immersive 3D masterpieces through cinematic motion, create AI videos, or enhance your pictures with vibrant AI effects, Loopsie has everything you need to elevate your creativity.

We update the app weekly with fresh AI effects and presets, ensuring you always have access to the latest AI trends and tools to make your content stand out & go viral.

Key Features You Must Try
Anime Filters – AI Art with a Tap!
Have you ever wondered what you’d look like as an anime character? Loopsie’s AI effects anime generator technology can turn your photos into toon headshots with a single tap. It’s fast, fun, and perfect for creating viral photos & videos that get people talking.
Explore Popular AI Effects & Presets

Choose from a wide variety of AI effects and presets to match any mood or theme. Some of our most-loved options include:

- AI Anime Generator: Turn yourself into your favorite anime character.
- 90’s AI Polaroid: Rediscover the charm of 90’s Polaroids.
- Legends: Add a heroic touch to your visuals.
- Vertigo: Create mesmerizing, dizzying motion AI effects.
- Neon & Sparkle: Light up your photos with vibrant, eye-catching details.
- Cloud, Vaporwave, VHS, Indie: Tap into retro vibes or futuristic aesthetics.

3D Photos – Add Depth and Dimension
Create immersive 3D photos with ease. Use Loopsie’s integrated 3D camera to capture the moment or animate any standard photo into a stunning 3D experience. From classic 360° wiggle AI effects to smooth vertical motions, Loopsie brings your photos to life like never before.

Cutting-Edge AI Technology
- AI-Powered Depth Prediction: Loopsie’s neural network intelligently predicts depth for every photo, giving it a realistic, dimensional look.
- Augmented Reality Stickers: Add 3D stickers that interact with your photos in captivating ways.
- Advanced 3D Scene Reconstruction: Our unique algorithm fills in missing details for a seamless 3D scene.
- 3D Subject Segmentation: Highlight key subjects in your photos with precise AI-powered segmentation.

Discover Loopsie AI Effects Pro – Unlock Your Full Potential
Upgrade to Loopsie AI Effects Pro to access all the premium AI effects, filters, tools, and presets. Whether you’re a casual creator or a content pro, our subscription plans are designed to fit your needs:
Weekly, Monthly, Yearly, or Lifetime Plans
Cancel anytime! Manage your subscription directly in your Account Settings.
Prefer a one-time purchase? Go for our Lifetime Access option for unlimited creativity.

Here’s what makes Loopsie the go-to app for creative viral content:
Intuitive interface that’s easy for beginners yet powerful enough for pros.
A constantly growing library of AI effects and tools updated weekly.
Seamless sharing to all major platforms, including Instagram, TikTok, and more.

Stay Connected with Loopsie
Have questions or feedback? iOS.support@loopsie.it – we’d love to hear from you!
Follow us on Instagram and TikTok (@loopsieapp) for inspiration, tutorials, and the latest updates.

Subscription and Free Trial Policy
Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled 24 hours before the end of the current period.
Manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal via your Account Settings.
Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited upon purchase of a subscription.

Terms and conditions:
https://bit.ly/2PWcXgi

Privacy policy:
https://www.iubenda.com/privacy-policy/8126812

apps.title: Pet Painter: Get Daily Pet Art
apps.description:
Make a pet free! Add their stickers to iMessage and Widget to your home screen too! 
 
CELEBRATE YOUR PET WITH AI STICKERS
Welcome to Pet Painter AI, where you can play with your dog or cat 24/7! Enjoy art of your pet that will wag into your iMessage Stickers and onto your Home Screen Widget every day. Can you guess the design? 

DESIGN AI ART OF YOUR DOG OR CAT IN SECONDS
Not sure where to start? Your pet's AI can suggest some chewy sticker designs to get your creativity flowing. You can design your dog or cat in funny poses at iconic places, right from your pet's home screen widget! 

Try these designs now:
- "Drinking a cappuccino in front of the Eiffel Tower"
- "Walking through Central Park with a wag of excitement and style"
- "Enjoying a chewy bone at the park, and looking extra furry"

CHALLENGE FRIENDS TO GUESS THE DESIGN
Share your dog or cat's pet art with friends or fam who can try to guess your creative design. If their first guess doesn't wag them straight to victory, your pet's AI can help them get the details.

DAILY TREAT FOR YOUR FURRY FRIENDS
Make your dog or cat's furry tail wag with a daily treat. Each treat unlocks an exclusive AI design. And guess what? You can give a treats directly from your dog or cat's Home Screen Widget! Get ready for chewy art that captures your dog or cat's wag and style.

Terms: https://petpainter.ai/terms-of-use
Privacy: https://petpainter.ai/privacy-policy
Subscription required to unlock full functionality.

apps.title: Art Inc. 2: Idle Museum
apps.description:
Step into the fascinating world of art and history with Art Inc 2! As the Buffalo Museum’s Director, it’s your mission to shape the growth and development of your establishment. This idle game allows you to dive deep into the experience of running a museum and collecting artifacts from all over the world while you enjoy a full-length story filled with plot twists and surprises.

Join Wilfred, Olive and Sherman Jones as they uncover the hidden mysteries behind each museum! Find out what your predecessor Warren Buffalo wanted you to know before he was poisoned - the dark secret of the Magic Paintbrush! 

ART INC 2 FEATURES: 
- Show off Custom Exhibits: Showcase your collection of paintings, sculptures, and historical items from various periods and cultures. 
- New Story Chapters: Uncover the secret behind a never-before-seen museum mystery! Find out what's hiding under your giant art collection...  
- Hundreds of Diverse Artifacts: From the Aztecs to the Flemish, from the fantastical to real life! We’ve got a vast variety of art - all the most famous pieces of history ready for collecting!
- Earn Thousands of Millions: You can make tons of money in this idle art collection game by collecting various currencies around the world! Don't eat the rich, BE the rich!
- Manage Museum Operations: Make sure your caretakers are well-trained, your facilities are top-notch, and your visitors are satisfied! They'll be wowed by your collection of rare artifacts! 
- Fun Visitor Interactions: Engage with a wide range of visitors, each with unique tastes and history. Use this information to increase your museum’s popularity and attract more visitors! 
- Musical Tapping: Tap your megaphone and play classical music! Tapping in an idle collection game has never been this fun. Try collecting all of the songs!
- New and Improved: Were you a fan of the original Art Inc game? Expect much more from this idle clicker game - there’s LOTS of new content! But don’t be scared if you haven’t played the first game - no prior knowledge is needed to play Art Inc 2. 
- Special Events: Host exhibits in various countries around the world to attract VIP visitors and boost your museum’s reputation! Go to Ancient Egypt, Greece, Atlantis and more!

Experience the joy of bringing history and culture to life in Art Inc 2 - whether you're a fan of idle simulation collection games, a history buff, or an art enthusiast, this game offers an engaging blend of strategy and fun that's sure to captivate you. Download Art Inc 2 now and start collecting artwork to build the world famous art museum of your dreams!

Support
Are you having problems? Email us at support@pixio.co or contact us in game by going to Settings> Email Us

Privacy Policy:
http://www.pixio.co/file/PixioPrivacyPolicy.pdf

raw_data.releaseNotes:

Design the museum of your imagination in Art Inc 2! Curate the finest art collection in the entire universe!
Discover what Sherman Jones, Silver Fox, and Wilfred are up to in the latest story chapter, and explore the events unfolding across time!
Can you distinguish the REAL artifacts from the FAKE ones? Play Art Inc 2 and uncover the truth today!

apps.title: FIBE - Album Cover & Art Maker
apps.description:
Craft Your Unique Album Cover Art!

FIBE transforms the art of album cover design, making it accessible and engaging for everyone. With FIBE, you can create stunning album covers right from your iPhone, blending creativity and convenience. Our app is dedicated to helping musicians, producers, and artists express their unique style and brand through custom album artwork.

Design Album Covers Like a Pro

Dive into the world of album art with FIBE's user-friendly yet professional-grade tools. Our specialized templates give your music the visual impact it deserves. Choose from a variety of styles and themes, or start from scratch to bring your vision to life. Whether it's for a single, EP, or full album, FIBE is equipped to elevate your music's visual identity.

For Every Music Genre and Artist

Our app caters to all genres and artistic visions. Whether you're a solo artist, a band, or a producer, FIBE provides the resources to match your music's tone and mood. From rock and pop to electronic and classical, find the perfect template or create your own design that resonates with your sound.

Unleash Your Creativity

FIBE is your canvas for creativity. Experiment with a vast collection of fonts, graphics, and effects to create an album cover that truly represents your music. Our intuitive design tools ensure precision and ease, allowing you to focus on the creative process.

Inspiration Meets Customization

Need a starting point? Browse our library of professional templates tailored for album covers. Customize them to fit your musical style and brand. With FIBE, you're not just choosing a design; you're crafting an identity for your music.

Easy Access and Professional Support

Download FIBE for free and start designing your album cover hassle-free. For any suggestions or feedback, our team of dedicated designers is just an email away at fibe@contractsq.com.

Flexible Subscription Options

Subscribe for unlimited access to all features and content within FIBE.
Choose from weekly, monthly, or annual billing.
Manage your subscription in your iTunes account settings.
Visit our terms of use at https://www.fibe-app.com/terms and privacy policy at https://www.fibe-app.com/privacy.

Elevate your music with FIBE – where your album's visual story begins!

raw_data.releaseNotes:
• Improved AI generation
• Performance and stability improvements

apps.title: BeCasso: Photo to Painting App
apps.description:
Transform your photos into unique, high-resolution artwork—with BeCasso’s powerful combination of artificial intelligence, neural networks, and artistic photo filters. 

BeCasso is a professional high-quality, high-resolution picture editing app that allows you to transform your snaps and photos into unique paintings. 64 Megapixel lossless exports give you massive details and quality, making your artwork perfectly suited to print on canvas, T-shirts or even a whole comic book: it’s your choice! The best part: Your photos won’t leave your device. Everything happens directly on your iPhone, iPad or Mac. 

Hundreds of photo filters are waiting for you to try them out. BeCasso offers styles of famous artists such as Picasso, van Gogh or Munch. A toolbox full of artistic filters, including oil, watercolor, cartoon, pencil drawing, and pop art, opens up endless possibilities for you to realize your vision of the perfect piece of art. 

All effects are fully adjustable. Our state-of-the-art retouch tools* allows you unlimited, pixel-precise alterations in real-time, all at your fingertips. Share your finished masterpieces on social media and let friends and family take part in your artistic journey. 

Share your finished masterpieces on Instagram, Twitter, TikTok and Facebook and allow friends and family to chime in your artistic expression. 

We work together with www.mypostcard.com to offer an integrated postcard service. They will send your awesome results as a real postcard for only $2.99, including free shipping! Keep in touch with your friends and family all over the world in a fun and easy way. Surprise them with a postcard to any occasion. We've also teamed up with CanvasPop to offer a printing service with a 100% "Love it" guarantee. Have your favorite moment printed on canvas or as a poster and delivered straight to your door. Even large sizes are not a problem thanks to our high-quality, high-resolution technology. 
 

Explore new ways of working with images and let your creativity flow—with BeCasso.  

Download and use the app for free now! Get BeCasso Premium* to unlock its full editing power. 

◆◆◆ Features ◆◆◆ 

▸ Transform photos into high-resolution* paintings – export up to 64MP for large prints and top-of-the-line digital productions. 
▸ Choose between dozens of styles of famous artists 
▸ Create vivid watercolor paintings, stunning pencil drawings or the perfect oil painting with BeCasso’s digital art styles 
▸ With Custom Styles you can personalize and save your very own styles with ease. 
▸ Use color filters to set the mood 
▸ Add a final touch with a vignette and a canvas filter 
▸ Your photos are transformed instantly, no waiting or internet connection required 
▸ Take full control of your digital art with state-of-the-art editing tools* 
▸ Use retouch tools* for pixel-precise touch-ups with your finger or the Apple Pencil 
▸ Create canvas prints, posters and postcards with our integrated printing service 
▸ Increased color rendering, extended dynamic range and wide gamut color support will let your images shine 
▸ Choose between High Efficiency Image Format to save storage space and lossless TIFF format for printing or productions. 
▸ Create stickers as you can now import and export transparent images into the app.  
▸ Support for RAW images of your iPhone 14 Pro or DSLR camera for seamless professional editing 

Download the app for free now!  

SUPPORT 
If you have any questions or feedback for us, please feel free to send us an email at support@digitalmasterpieces.com. Our team is available 24 hours a day, so we'll get right to it as soon as possible. 


Optimized for OS 26, the iPhone 17 and iPhone 17 Pro.

* Subscribe to unlock all features. 

Terms of Use: https://www.digitalmasterpieces.com/app-terms-of-use/

raw_data.releaseNotes:
These enhancements are designed to make our app more efficient and enjoyable for all users. Embark on your artistic journey as you discover the best and most stunning filters with BeCasso! 

OS 26 and UI improvements
We’ve updated the app to run smoothly on the latest operating systems. You’ll notice better performance and improved stability. We also introduce a new fresh look with Liquid Glass. Several screens now feature the new Liquid Glass UI, giving your artwork more space and a cleaner editing experience.

Improved Zoom & Canvas Placement
We’ve redesigned the zoom view, so your canvas is easier to position — no more sliders getting in the way of your edits!

New Custom Magic Styles*
The Magic filter category just got a major upgrade! We've added more than 20 brand-new Magic Styles to give your photos even more artistic flair. But wait, there's more... you can now create your own Custom Styles! Just load any image, and BeCasso will learn its unique look—right on your device. Turn your favorite artwork or photo into a personalized style you can use again and again.

More Precision and Control
We've refined all sliders for better control and understandability. You can now see exact values and reset them easily—just double-tap the slider or tap the default value. The signature tool has also been improved, allowing you to move, rotate, and scale your signature freely with touch gestures.

Custom Vignettes
We've given the vignettes a massive overhaul! This update includes 13 new expressive vignettes and advanced customization tools. But that’s not all: You can now personalize your artwork even more by adding your own vignette images. Additionally, our new Auto Retouch feature ensures your main subject stands out.

Custom Signatures
You can now add your own logo, watermark, or signature to your artwork. Simply load you’re your own signature signature from Files or Photos.

Image Playground**
Produce fun, original images in seconds with Image Playground directly on your device. Create entirely new images based on descriptions, with suggested concepts and styles such as illustration and animation. Use our app to turn your creations into high-quality art effortlessly. 

macOS Support
Our app is now a native macOS app, offering enhanced performance and features. We've expanded device compatibility to include Intel Macs, ensuring a wider range of users can enjoy the app. To streamline your workflow, we've optimized the user experience with keyboard shortcuts, intuitive navigation, and a sleek, native macOS design. Plus, seamless Finder and file-system integration makes loading and saving images a breeze.

UX Improvements
We've made significant improvements across all platforms to enhance your  experience. The user interface is now more intuitive, with features like hover support for iPad and improved Retouch Tools with a clear visual indicator of the retouch area. 

Improved Auto Retouch
We have improved the Auto Retouch feature for you. Besides usability and  cosmetic tweaks, we improved its speed as well as detection accuracy.

The latest version contains bug fixes and performance improvements. 

If you have any questions or feedback for us, please feel free to send us an email at support@digitalmasterpieces.com. Our team is on hand 24 hours a day, so we’ll get right on it.

* iOS or iPadOS 18 required. Available on devices that support Apple Intelligence, only and the iPhone 14.
** Image playground is available on devices that support Apple Intelligence, only.

apps.title: Art Color - Color by Number
apps.description:
Art Color - Color by Number  is one of the best paint by number coloring book with various categories of coloring pages. Coloring Pages are update everyday, you can always find images suite to you. It is  total Free! We offer this free coloring book as a color therapy to release your stress. Share your artworks to your friends and color anytime & anywhere.


Feature:
Simple & Easy to Paint
Coloring has never been so easy, all coloring pages are marked by number, Just choose coloring pages that you favorite and flow the hint layer to paint by number to bring them to life. Everyone can become an outstanding artist in paint by number.
Various Coloring Pages with Different Categories
Thousands of coloring pages including animals, mandalas, unicorns, food and many other categories in our coloring game.

Color therapy
Paint by Number is one of the best ways for adults to improve their mood. Color and recolor bright, beautiful coloring pages to release stress, feel relaxed by number coloring.

Daily Update
You will get fresh coloring pages everyday in the Art Color - Color by Number.

Paint by Number Anytime & Anywhere
Try to start this coloring games for relaxation and creation anytime or anywhere, you can color and revise your coloring pages Anytime & Anywhere.

Totally free
All Coloring Pages in Art number Coloring - Color by Number & Coloring Games are totally free!. No hidden fees.

Quick Sharing
Just one tap to share your artworks to your friends on social networks.

Offline Coloring Supported
Just download free coloring pages in advance, then you can pass time with your favorite color by number game, even if you are offline.

Do you want to release stress?
Do you a true color by number lover?
Don’t hesitate to download Art Color - Color By Number & Coloring book to start your coloring journey!

---------------------------------------


Art Color Premium
- With Art Color Premium you can subscribe for unlocking all pictures, removing ads and watermark.
- Weekly Art Color Premium automatically renews for $9.99/month after the 3-day free trial. Weekly subscription is $9.99, yearly subscription is $49.99, equal to the same price that "Apple's App Store Matrix" determines in other currencies.
- These purchases are auto-renewable subscription. Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at the confirmation of purchase or at the end of the trial period of purchase, if it's offered.
- The subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.

Terms: https://pcoloring.com/anc_terms_of_service.html
Privacy: https://pcoloring.com/color_number_policy.html

Contact us: ares.nju@gmail.com
