apps.title: makeART: Art Editor+Generator
apps.description:
Go from observing art to making art with makeART, an interactive art studio. 
A unique combination of art + tech + ai + different modes for you to makeART.

CANVAS TOUCH MODE
• Make art by selecting an art style then just tapping and swiping the screen
• Customize canvas art styles' opacity, size, background, layers, art pieces to whatever your art aesthetic is
• Get lost in art by playing and combining different tools
• Infinite art possibilities that are highly curated, designed, and interactive
• Tap with two fingers to undo or hit the undo button
• Try changing a few or a number of elements then touch the screen to see a spectrum of amazing art
• Freestyle lets you infinitely play + makeART

PHOTO EDITOR
• An art photo editor and camera that lets you make artsy photos
• Choose art styles and create your own masterpiece by simply tapping the screen
• Interactive, surprising, instant, immersive, generative art pieces and experiences
• See and feel art with sight, touch, haptic, and motion

WORLD MODE
• Collab with people around the world
• Add, edit, share, + download whatever 
• Unique art styles made by you + other makeART artists
• See how many other artists you're making are with + how many countries are connected

FILTERS + EFFECTS + ARTISTIC STYLES
• 200+ highly designed art filters that will make instant unique artworks with your photos + camera
• Made by emerging artists from around the world
• Art styles with infinite possibilities: flowers+time, brush, canvas, new classics, glass, abstract, crystal, knots, fuzzy, guayana, monsteras, chrysanthemums, home, hearts
• Each filter is unique every time given the generative and customizable design system
• Make instagram, snap, tiktok, worthy art, selfies, portraits, moments

ADVANCED AND UNIQUE PHOTO EDITING + ART TOOLS
• Modify and personalize any filter by choosing the art tool then whatever art piece you want
• Customize every filter and effect by playing with opacity + size + layers
• Add more art in touch mode - hit touch then tap, swipe to add art anywhere
• Add brushstrokes with your finger in draw mode
• Move, scale, and rotate an art piece wherever + however you’re feeling
• Combine all tools with filters and make museum, gallery, + street level artwork

MEMBERSHIP + SUBSCRIPTION
• Become a makeART+ member to unlock all exclusive filters & effects + remove makeART watermark
• Your membership support allows us to do more with artists + art + keep free for everyone else
• You can try out membership with a 3-day free trial under the annual plan or sign up for a monthly plan

As always feel free to shoot us a note, thoughts@makeartapp.com, we love hearing from you.

There's way more to come.

Thanks so much for making & spreading art.

• made by humans that love art + tech •




Standard Apple Terms Of Use (EULA):http://www.apple.com/legal/itunes/appstore/dev/stdeula

• New art styles: Sculptures + Objects + Moving Lines + Architecture + Nature + People + Wave

• Single + All enhancement for opacity and size tools

As always feel free to shoot us a note, thoughts@makeartapp.com, we love hearing from you
+ rate us if you're into what we're doing with art + tech.

When you become a makeART+ member you're helping spread the making of art + supporting artists.

There's way more to come.

Thanks so much for making art.

apps.title: Ambie - AI Art Game
apps.description:
Create custom wall art and curate gallery walls for stunning spaces all over the world in the #1 AI Art Game.

What's Ambie all about?
  1. Express your creativity through stunning wall art
  2. Compete in design challenges set in gorgeous spaces
  3. Vote on awesome creations from fellow artists
  4. Collect cool art supplies to level up your designs
  5. Challenge your friends and see who's the real art boss
  6. Buy real prints of your designs—shipped to your door!

Why you'll love it:
  1. AI-powered creativity: Beginner artist? No problem.
  2. Huge variety: Design cozy cafes, penthouses & more.
  3. Community vibes: Share, discover, vote and grow!
  4. Chill and create: Lose yourself in digital art design.
  5. Multiplayer challenge mode: Inspire your friends!
  6. Print Shop: Order high-quality prints of your creations.

From pixels to print, Ambie is the easiest way to get cozy and let your creativity run wild. Our Print Shop offers museum-quality fine art paper and Giclée premium inks, ensuring your creations look as good in person as they do on screen.

Ready to unleash your inner artist? Download Ambie now and let's make some magic together!
Catch us on Instagram (instagram.com/AmbieGame) and Facebook (facebook.com/AmbieGame) for daily inspiration and artsy goodness!

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: ArtStage: Display Your Art
apps.description:
ArtStage — Showcase your art and sell more. Designed with artists, interior designers, galleries, and art entrepreneurs in mind, ArtStage empowers you to effortlessly generate photorealistic mockups of your art.. Choose from over 500 premium HD room interiors to help stage your art easily. Artists can access ultra-realistic, customizable frames, advanced cropping tools, and seamlessly add text or watermarks to your artwork and mockups. All images are fully licensed for personal and commercial use. Showcase your art on a mockup wall or in contemporary interior design trends. New 3D virtual rooms are added bi-weekly.


ArtStage allows your mockups to demonstrate how your art complements a buyer’s room or space, facilitating informed decisions. Our user-friendly interface simplifies artwork upload for all artists. Download today and start selling tomorrow with the ArtStage app.

ARTSTAGE APP FEATURES


PREVIEW YOUR ART IN 3D VIRTUAL ROOMS

• Craft captivating mockups of your artwork in photorealistic 3D virtual rooms with ArtStage.
• Display individual pieces or intricate collages of your own design.
• Import photos of your own wall, virtual room, or a client-provided space for a tailored environment to display artwork or a gallery.

PERSONALIZE YOUR ART WITH TEXT AND WATERMARKS
• Ensure your artwork is protected online by designing a custom watermark and positioning it anywhere on the mockup. 
• Overlay text to bring attention to a title or price with the ArtStage app.

SHOWCASE YOUR ART IN FRAMES WITH ADVANCED CROPPING TOOLS
• ArtStage app offers a variety of realistic frames against virtual rooms and walls. 
• Access varying textures and styles to showcase and complement any artistic style.


• Crop your artwork into a circle or straighten a crooked image. With ArtStage app, there are no bounds to your art mockups or imagination.

SELL YOUR ART WITH CERTIFICATES OF AUTHENTICITY
• Easily create and share certificates of authenticity, and increase the value of your art gallery. 
• Elevate your professionalism by giving them to your clients.

AUTOMATIC SIZING AND POSITIONING
• The ArtStage appauto-size and location feature intelligently scales and repositions your art. 
• Fine-tune by using familiar pinch and drag gestures.
• Rotate, resize, and reposition your artwork. 
• Fine-tune your artwork's shadows for the perfect look.
• Upload multiple pieces to create a unique collage or triptych that brings your work to life.


SHARE ARTWORK MOCKUPS IN HIGH DEFINITION
• Once your mockup is complete, save your preview or share in stunning high definition.
• Ensure that your art looks exceptional wherever it's displayed.


CREATED BY ARTISTS, FOR ARTISTS

ArtStage simplifies art presentation and maximizes sales for artists. Don't hesitate! Download ArtStage now and elevate your art with striking, high-definition interiors. For more information, visit https://artstageapp.com/contact-us

TERMS AND CONDITIONS
https://artstageapp.com/terms-conditions

raw_data.releaseNotes:
What’s New:
 - New rooms 

if you like artstage please give us a review as it really brightens our day and if you have any requests feel free to get in touch (contact us via the Settings screen).

- Artstage team

apps.title: ARTDEX App: Organize Your Art
apps.description:
ARTDEX App is a convenient art digitizing “tool” to help organizing your art collection. 
At home for those paintings on your wall or on-the-go to art fairs and museum visits. 

Your digitized artwork on ARTDEX App will not get mixed with hundreds of your holiday and family photos! Artwork photo images taken from your ARTDEX App get deposited directly to your ARTDEX folder.

You can then efficiently organize them by a quick “touch and drop” to each collection folder, and maintain your personal archive - i.e. Frieze Art Fair 2015, Orchard Gallery Show, Pratt Student Exhibit 2015, Shanghai Contemporary Museum, etc. etc.

ARTDEX offers web and mobile based art collection archive & management tool and professional social network combined platform, providing an easy-to-use and social forum, to create and share digital art inventories of both physical & virtual art collections. 

ARTDEX.COM platform connects a global community of artists, collectors, curators, and all levels of art professionals and art enthusiasts, beyond geographical barriers and existing commercial art sales channels, to share undiscovered art, valuable art information, and inspirations with one another.


Features: 

*Account: First sign up on ARTDEX.COM and create your profile. 

*Add Art: Use ARTDEX App to “snap” a photo of any art piece, to organize your physical art collections, at home and on the go (art fairs, gallery visits, museum exhibitions and more!) 

*Organize: Create a new folder “+” to organize your art images as easy as “touch and drop”.

*My Connections: View and manage who you’re currently  following and who your followers are. Invite your friends and contacts to join your art circle and share artwork and inspirations.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: ImageGen AI Photo Generator
apps.description:
AI Art Generator is a creative application that uses artificial intelligence to transform your ideas into stunning digital artwork. Whether you're an experienced artist or just starting to explore your creative side, AI Art Generator offers a fun and easy way to create unique pieces of art in just a few clicks. Experiment with different styles, color palettes, and inspiration sources to create art that truly reflects your vision.

Key Features:
-AI-Powered Art Creation: Generate beautiful and intricate artwork with the help of advanced AI algorithms. Simply provide a description or a rough sketch, and the AI will create a visually stunning piece based on your input.
-Vast Style Library: Explore a wide range of artistic styles from classical to modern, abstract to realistic. Apply your favorite style to your art with just one click.
-Inspiration Gallery: Browse the gallery of AI-generated artwork to find inspiration for your own creations. Save and share your favorite pieces with others.
-Export and Share: Export your artwork in high-resolution formats for printing or sharing online. Showcase your creativity on social media and impress your friends and followers.

Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
Privacy Policy: https://github.com/Writer-Sonic/Imagen-For-Midjourney#imagen-for-midjourney

apps.title: Uranus Ai Art Stable Generator
apps.description:
Uranus.AI is a fun and easy way to turn your words into mesmerizing digital art! Whether you’re an artist, entrepreneur, marketer, Social media influencer, meme maker, or someone that is interested in how artificial intelligence will help humanity, Uranus is right for you! 

All you have to do is describe what kind of image you’re thinking about in as little or much detail as you’d like. Anything works (Rainbow cat, submarine flying through space)

Get even better results by picking a style like (Cyberpunk, Dali, Fantasy, Retro, Sci-Fi, 3d Art, Photography, Painting, and dozens more). 

Hit create to watch Uranus.ai bring your idea to life instantly! Once you’ve got the perfect masterpiece, share it and watch the likes come in!

Stop struggling with your own artistic limitations! No talent needed! Your ideas and imagination can come to life through the power of artificial intelligence. 

Let your imagination run wild! 

Tag #MadeWithUranus for chances to get featured and win prizes every week!

By the way, Artificial Intelligence wrote this description of Uranus 

*No humans were harmed in the making of this app.*

-----------

UNLIMITED ACCESS SUBSCRIPTION
• You can subscribe for unlimited access to all features and content offered for purchases within Uranus
• Subscriptions are billed weekly at the rate selected depending on the subscription plan.
• Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
• Subscription automatically renews at the cost of the chosen package unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
• If eligible for free trial and you subscribe before your free trial ends, the rest of your free trial
period will be forfeited as soon as your purchase is confirmed. Subscriptions will start immediately after free trial ends unless cancelled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the trial period.

apps.title: gowithYamo: The Art Guide
apps.description:
For the curious and creative: We don’t just guide you to discover art wherever you go; we bring together our community to connect over the art they love. 

Art is everywhere.
Download the app to discover, connect, and curate.

Key Features:
Map view:
Browse over 10,000 art spaces to discover current and future exhibitions across the UK.
Filter by medium, location, and more. 16th Century painting? Surrealist sculpture in Liverpool? Free photography talks? We've got it.
Navigate with ease; our Map feature provides clear directions to each destination, making your journey smooth and hassle-free.

Reviews:
Unleash your inner art critic and leave reviews on the exhibitions you visited in the app! 
Explore reviews from a diverse range of perspectives, and gain fresh insights that enrich your understanding of the art world.

Profiles:
Find every exhibition you've visited and every review you've written, neatly catalogued in your profile. Rediscover past favourites and track your artistic evolution in one seamless timeline. Follow friends and creatives to stay in the loop with their latest discoveries and insights.

Challenges:

apps.title: Docent Art
apps.description:
DISCOVER ART BEYOND YOUR ECHO CHAMBER
Docent is the first AI-powered mobile application to offer a fully-personalized experience for discovering, accessing, and collecting contemporary masterpieces.
PERSONALIZED + CURATED
Combining our teams’ expertise in art and machine learning, we offer an unprecedented and ever-growing selection of 10,000+ artworks meticulously curated from over 100 galleries spanning 30 countries and 5 continents, right at your fingertips. Users define their preferences, and Docent provides personalized recommendations for artworks that they will love and want to collect. Our platform’s uniqueness lies in its meticulous match-making process, connecting collectors with a carefully curated selection of top artists. This ensures that unique offerings align with discerning demand. Our tailored recommendations evolve with the users’ tastes, empowering them to discover more, learn more and appreciate more art.
FEATURES
Discover Art: Swipe through a curated selection of contemporary art to broaden your perspective.
Receive Personalized Recommendations: Receive daily, tailored suggestions based on your preferences through Docent’s AI.
Gain Insights: Deepen your engagement with contemporary art through reliable insights into artists and their practice.
Collect with Confidence: Enjoy exclusive access to galleries worldwide, and purchase your favorite artworks.

apps.title: Sexy AI Art Generator
apps.description:
Turn your words into photos & beautiful digital artworks using the power of AI, All you need to do is enter a prompt, pick an art style - and watch, Sexy AI Art Generator bring your idea to life in seconds. 

Do you want to create a photo, picture, drawing or painting that is your art work? Sexy AI Art Generator is an art station for you. You can turn text into any image or photo you want.

You don’t need a paintbrush, pencil, or any art supplies to make beautiful artwork, all you need is an idea. Take a back seat and let Sexy AI Art Generator unleash your creativity.

◉ Turn words into art, ask Dream to paint you:
- Movie Posters
- Star Signs
- Song Lyrics
- Journal Entries
- Poems

and much more!

◉ Have AI Generated Pictures & Images
Using advanced AI technology, you can turn any text into a stunning image in seconds. Whether you're looking to create a beautiful piece of art or design your own anime characters, our Sexy AI Art Generator app has got you covered.

◉ Explore art styles
Whether you’re looking for a vibrant colourful painting or something darker and more dystopian, AI Art Generator has you covered with an array of selected styles.

◉ Create art from images
Start with an image as a visual base for your prompt. Upload a photo or select one from our library, and watch our AI transform it into a masterpiece tailored to your vision. Transform photos of your partners or bring your kids artwork to life. Enjoy your AI Generated photos & images. 

◉ Share Your Art & Go Viral
Share your art with your friends, family, or on social media to join the latest AIArt trend.

◉ Get Inspired & Explore Artwork
Save your artwork to your profile so that you can view it for later, it’s that simple! Get an extra boost of inspiration by browsing the public gallery of amazing images generated by AI artists from all over the world. Explore and like the ideas of others and get your creative juices flowing!

◉ Edit with text
Customize your images & photos and adjust tiny details by writing a simple instruction. Whether you want to change the hair color, add a background, or adjust the lighting, the possibilities are endless. Create your own AI Generated Photos!

Our AI drawing and painting tools make it easy for you to create images that reflect your unique style and vision. With our art creator feature, you can experiment with different colors, textures, and patterns until you achieve the perfect look. Unleash your creativity and start making incredible images today with our Sexy AI Art Generator app.

Privacy Policy: https://insider.support/visionary-fastaiartgenerator/privacy-policy
Terms: https://insider.support/visionary-fastaiartgenerator/terms

apps.title: Magic Diamond Painting－Gem Art
apps.description:
Magic Diamond Painting is a fresh take on classic coloring games. Explore the world of visually dazzling mosaic diamond art works. It’s a new creative form of pixel art that has taken the world by storm!  

Let's get started with diamond painting art by number! 


Anyone can create beautiful artworks that shimmer, sparkle, and shine. You’ll fall in love with magic diamond coloring by numbers, as it’s easy to learn and incredibly relaxing and enjoyable. If you really like painting games for kids and adults and are eager to find something truly unique, we are there for you! Diamond art is great for people of all ages and skill levels. 

Apply shiny precious stones onto a canvas to complete the diamond picture and marvel at the beauty of your own piece of diamond art!  

Key features 

Find a huge variety of stunning designs! Explore themes like Animals, Nature, Sweets, Fantasy, Mandalas, and other free coloring pages to find a diamond painting that speaks to you; 

Enjoy easy gameplay — work your way across the canvas diamond by diamond and create breathtaking artworks! 

Improve your painting skills and channel your creativity into making a sparkling piece of diamond art! 

Experiment with the color palette to encourage creativity and vivid imagination! 

Discover the joy and stress-relieving benefits of diamond coloring — calm and relaxing background music and sounds will help you unwind while creating beautiful artwork; 

Share your shiny diamond art masterpieces with friends on social media or save them to your device; 

Get daily bonuses and prizes for completing diamond paintings that shimmer and shine! 

This relaxing diamond pixel coloring game is all you need to release your inner artist! 

Paint with diamonds to create magnificent pixel art by number. Transform gorgeous tiny sapphires, rubies, and jades into colorful masterpieces of painting art. You’ll be carried away by the vibrant colors of precious stones. Let each moment shine with relaxing, meditating diamond pixel art! 

Terms of Use: https://zimad.com/terms-of-use/magic-diamond-paintings
Privacy Policy: https://zimad.com/policy/

raw_data.releaseNotes: An update is already available to download. The new version of the game mainly contains bug fixes we resolved. Several changes have also been implemented to improve app performance and stability. We really appreciate your support and encourage you to give us as much feedback as you can — together, we'll make the game even more exciting. Join our official community and stay up to date with our latest news and events.

apps.title: Pixel Art Maker
apps.description:
"Pixel Art Maker" is a drawing tool for pixel art like a retro game.

◇ Easy to use
You can draw a pixel art soon after Launching the app.

◇ Import a photo
Pixelate a photo.

◇ Create an animated pixel art.
Draw one pixel art, copy it, and then you can draw an animation.


Feathers:
• Draw a pixel art of 8x8〜256x256 pixel size.
(I recommend 16x16 or 32x32 pixel size.)
• Change Color pallet(limited to 32 colors).
• Zoom  the picture to draw.
(you can pinch in and out your pixel art with your two fingers.)
• Load and save drawing data.
• Load your photo from Photos.
• Export a pixel art with a transparent color.
• Enlarge the image up to 2048x2048 to export.
• Save your picture to Photos.
• Send the picture to another app.
• Export animated gif file
 (If the canvas size is 128 x 128 or less, an animation is up to 256 frames. For larger sizes, it is up to 64 frames. )
* An animated gif file is saved in  Photos, But it is not animated on Photos.

• Finger Mode
Mode Finger is a default mode. Draw points with your finger directly on the screen.
 
• Cursor mode
 Move your finger on the screen to move the cursor and press the "PIXEL" button to draw a point.
 Push "Menu" -> "Settings" -> "Change Drawing Mode" button to switch to cursor mode.

• Remove Ads(Premium.)


* When running this app on an Apple Silicon Mac (iPad version), photo import has the following limitations:
1. Animated images (e.g., GIF) are not supported.
2. Photos may be imported at low resolution.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
• Improved drawing performance
  I enhanced drawing performance in preparation for supporting larger pixel art in the future.

• Fixed screen shrinking issue on app startup
  This was improved in v2.2.18, but could still occur rarely due to timing conditions.
  I have implemented additional measures to address this.

  If you still experience this issue, please let me know:
  ① Device model
  ② OS version

apps.description:
Drag & divide lines as you want! 
Connect and weave lines to make wonderful shapes and patterns of STRING ART.

Line Puzzle: String Art is a Line puzzle game.
Easy to play game for all ages. 

HOW TO PLAY
• Drag and connect the lines to a point!
• Try to make the same shape as shown above!
• Nails cannot be moved!
• Lines cannot be overlapped!

FEATURES
• NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM! Enjoy line puzzles anytime, anywhere!
• FREE AND EASY TO PLAY! Suitable for all ages.

*Recommend animation will receive additional points, which can be redeem into free products.

[Pixel Art Drawing Contest]
*Monthly drawing contest, submit contest themed design for a chance to win free prizes

[Import & Export]
*Import and convert picture/GIF/animation into design, and export your designs to share them on the social media platform

[Pixel Art  Editor]
*Professional drawing & animations tools, including: multiple layers, color canvas, text editors etc... 
*Support animation creation, duplicate, merge, bgm recording function.
*Painting canvas with full RGB coloring support
*Support area selection, duplicate, move. Support layers duplicate, move, combine, hidden function.

[Gif & Video]
*Convert GIF and video into pixel art animations*

[Color by Number]
*Free Color by Number games.

[Message]
*Like, comments, follows notification. Support in-app instant messaging.

apps.title: LAST CLOUDIA: Pixel Art RPG
apps.description:
WHAT IS LAST CLOUDIA?
A fantasy RPG that weaves a sprawling tale with quirky characters and cinematic effects. Its gorgeous, fast-paced battles feature pixel art characters sweeping though 3D playspaces. Download the game now!

CINEMATIC EFFECTS AND SWEEPING SOUNDTRACK
A riveting tale told with pixel-art characters and 3D backgrounds, brought to life with lovingly crafted music and animation!

WHITE-KNUCKLE COMBAT ACTION
Heart-pounding real-time combat action at a speed that's only possible with pixel art!

DEEP CHARACTER-BUILDING SYSTEM
Go beyond collecting strong characters—train your favorite characters to have the stats you want! It's all up to you!

HANDS-FREE AUTOPLAY
No need to grind manually—just gear up your team and send them out to collect power-up materials!

STAR-STUDDED CAST OF VOICE ACTORS
Famous Japanese voice actors provide dynamic voices for characters in battle, when powering up, on the Home screen, and more!

—STORY—
Welcome to Granzelia, where people live among magical beasts. 

Long ago this world was tyrannically ruled by the God of Ruin, until the hero Adel and goddess Lilaha joined forces to seal it away. In the centuries since then, that hero's bloodline built the Aldana Empire to peacefully rule all the land—but lately changes are afoot.

As reports of strange beast attacks surge, the 12th Order knight Kyle and the magical beast Rei set out on a mission. Neither knows it's the start of an epic battle that will shake the world!

You'll love Last Cloudia if you like...
• Playing any fantasy role playing game
• Games with classic pixel art, made just for game fans
• Anime or any RPG where you play though a legendary tale
• Any traditional JRPG (Japanese role-playing game) with intense battles and story development
• Action games where players mow through foes in 3D playspaces

SWORDS, SORCERY, AND SCINTILLATING COMBAT!
The RPG Last Cloudia has it all!

------------

apps.title: Keyboard Art
apps.description:
It's high time that your boring computer keyboards had some colors and artwork showcased on them. Use paint brushes, stencils and spray paint to create cute, eye-popping art on those keycaps.
Create, decorate, work and play!
Keyboard Art is free.

Have fun!
